6Ɔɔtole bɛ ne, ɔfale sɔ dwirɛ ne tole bɛ nyunu. 7Na besele ye kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ dwirɛ yeɛ me mene ɔne yɛ ka ye? Wɔ ngoaa ngɔhora sɔ nikyee ne yɔ le! 8Esikaa bɔ yɛnwuni ye wɔ yɛ bɔtɔ ne anu ne, yɛsa yɛfa yɛfili Kanaan aseɛ so yɛbrɛle wɔ. Nzu ati yeɛ yɛ́wua ɛdwetɛ anaa sikaa kɔkorɛ yɛ́fi wɔ mene awuro ɔ? 9Sɛ enwu kulie ne wɔ yɛ nu biala berɛ a, maa behũ ye, na yɛ ngaa ne koso yɛkɔyɛ yɛ mene ngoaa.” 10Awuro neafoɛ ne sele kyɛ, “Yoo, mepene so, sona bɔ ngonwu kulie ne wɔ ye berɛ ne, ɔkɔyɛ m’akoaa, nakoso ɛmɔ ngaa ne de, ɛmɔkɔfa bɛ nwo bekoli.” 11Yiti ebiala tole ye bɔtɔ ne ase ndɛndɛ, na ebiala sangyele ye bɔtɔ deɛ noa. 12Na awuro neafoɛ ne neaneane nu; ɔhyɛle ye bo fili bamuɛbaa ne deɛ so oodwuli kasiɛ ne aso. Na onwuni kulie ne Benyamin bɔtɔ deɛ ne anu. 13Ɔwale ye sɔ nen, besunzuale bɛ ndaadeɛ nu, na ebiala sá sesale ye nningyein guale ye afunum so, na besale bɛ si bɛhɔle kuro ne aso.
14Yuda ne oliɛma mɔ beedwuli Yosef awuro nen, né ɔtɛwɔ berɛ, na bɛlelale aseɛnwo wɔ ye nyunu. 15Yosef bisale bɛ kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ nikyee yeɛ ɛmɔayɔ ye? Anaa ɛmɔnze kyɛ sona bɔ ɔte kyɛ me de, ɔse ase ɔ?” 16Na Yuda buale kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ yeɛ yɛkã yɛkyire me mene ɔ? Nzikyɛ dwirɛ yeɛ yɛkã ɔ? Yɛyɛ sɛɛ né yasa yɛ nwo? Nyameɛ ama wɔ ngoaa nwo ala so; yayɛ me mene ngoaa, yɛ ne sona bɔ benwuni kulie ne wɔ ye dɔ ne yeɛ yayɛ ngoaa ɔ.” 17Nakoso Yosef sele bɛ kyɛ, “Daabi, mengɔyɔ ye sɔ le! Sona bɔ benwuni kulie ne wɔ ye dɔ ne angome yeɛ ɔkɔyɛ m’akoaa ɔ; ɛmɔ ngaa ne de, ɛ́mɔsa bɛhɔ ɛmɔ ase dɔ asomdwee nu.”
Yuda serɛ ma Benyamin
18Na Yuda hɔle Yosef nwo berɛ oosele ye kyɛ, “Me mene, mesrɛ wɔ, ma w’akoaa osusu edwirɛ kãa nwo ohyire ye mene; nnɛfɛ w’akoaa so yaa, ofikyɛ wɔ de wɔ diberɛ te kyɛ Faro bɔbɔ deinn. 19Me mene bisale ye ngoaa kyɛ, ‘Aso ɛmɔ ase tɛ te ase, na ɛmɔle aliɛmaa bieku’? 20Na yɛbuale yɛ mene kyɛ, ‘Yoo, yɛ baba tɛ wɔ berɛ, wayɛ aworowaa. Yɛle aliɛmaa kãa ko wɔ berɛ, yɛ baba ye aworowaa nu baa ɛne; oni awa deɛ awu maa waha ye ngome, na ye baba kuro ye dwirɛ paa. 21Yeɛ esele wɔ ngoaa kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔfa ye bɛ́brɛ me maa nwu ye.’ 22Na yɛsele me mene kyɛ, ‘Abɛɛmaa ne ngɔhora ye baba anwo fi, ofikyɛ sɛ ofi ɔse anwo a, ɔse kowu.’ 23Yeɛ ɛha hyirele wɔ ngoaa kyɛ, ‘Sɛ ɛmɔamva ɛmɔ aliɛma kasiɛ ne bamma a, mengɔnea ɛmɔ nyunu ko.’ 24Yɛsa yɛhɔle w’akoaa me baba dɔ nen, yɛfale yɛ mene noa dwirɛ yɛɛbɔle ye amaneɛ. 25Na yɛ baba sele yɛ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔsa bɛhɔ bɛɛtɔ aleɛ kãa bɛbrɛ yɛ’ nen, 26yɛbuale kyɛ, ‘Yɛngɔhora kɔ. Sɛ y’eliɛma kãa ne ɔne yɛ kɔ de a, ye de yɛkɔhɔ; ofikyɛ sɛ y’eliɛma kãa ne ɔbboka yɛ so a, biaa ne ngɔnea yɛ nyunu po.’ 27Yeɛ w’akoaa, bɔ ɔte me baba ne, osele yɛ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔse kyɛ me ne me ye ne yɛwole mma mmienzua nyɔ; 28bɛ nu ko afi me sa, na ngane kyɛ, amba kaka bie atete ye pasapasa, na ofi berɛ ne, mannwu ye ko. 29Sɛ ɛmɔfa ɛhe koso bɛkɔ ná nikyee bie yɛ ye a, ɛmɔkɔmaa nne aworabɔlɛ ngɔfa me gyein ngɔhɔ ɛborɔ.’ 30Yiti kekesaala ye, sɛ mesa mekɔ w’akoaa me baba dɔ, na sɛ abɛɛmaa ne ɔbboka yɛ so a, ye de kyɛbɔ ɔne abɛɛmaa ne besi bɛte ko nen, 31sɛ onwu kyɛ abɛɛmaa ne ɔbboka yɛ so a, okowu; na wɔ ngoaa kɔwɔ w’akoaa bɔ ɔte yɛ baba ne kɔme asi maa ole aworabɔlɛ ɔkɔfa ye gyein kɔhɔ ɛborɔ. 32Na me, w’akoaa, nnili abɛɛmaa ne anwo agyinamuɛ wɔ me baba nyunu kyɛ, ‘Sɛ manza mamva ye mammrɛ wɔ a, ye de ngoli fɔ wɔ me baba nyunu me ngyẽa bɔ ngoli ye aseɛ ye aso amukoraa.’ 33Yiti afei, mesrɛ wɔ, maa w’akoaa, nzi abɛɛmaa ne gya nu na nyɛ me mene akoaa; na mmom abɛɛmaa ne de, maa ɔne oliɛma mɔ besa bɛhɔ. 34Méyɛ sɛɛ né masa mahɔ me baba berɛ wɔ aberɛ bɔ abɛɛmaa ne ɔbboka me so ɔ? Membena kyɛ menwu kyɛ edwirɛ tɛɛ bie kɔto me baba ɔ.”

Title: GYENESISE 45
Content:
Yosef ye ye nwo ali kyire oliɛma mɔ
1 Afei Yosef angora anhyɛ ye nwo so wɔ ye somvoɛ amukoraa bɔ bɛwɔ berɛ ne anyunu, yiti ɔteane nu sele bɛ kyɛ, “Ebiala ófi wa fite!” Na Yosef yele ye nwo ali hyirele oliɛma nemɔ nen, né sona foforɛ biala ɔnne berɛ. 2Na Yosef teateane nu suni maa Misraimfoɛ nemɔ ne Faro awuro ama tele. 3Yeɛ Yosef sele oliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, “Me ole Yosef; aso me baba tɛ te ase?” Nakoso oliɛma nemɔ angora ye noa ye, ofikyɛ bɛ nwo dwirili bɛ kyɛ banwu ye ɔ.
4Na Yosef sele oliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, “Mesrɛ ɛmɔ, ɛ́mɔpingye me nwo wa.” Yiti bepingyele ye. Na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛmɔ aliɛma Yosef bɔ ɛmɔtɔnene ye maa oofitele Misraim ne, ye ole me. 5Na afei nnɛmɔma ɛmɔ wora bɔ, yeɛ nnɛma ɛmɔfu bɛ nwo kyɛ ɛmɔtɔnene me maa mmamvitele ɛwa ɔ; ofikyɛ Nyameɛ somane me kyɛ nni ɛmɔ nyunu na nne mmenia ngoa. 6Ɛhɔen piri ne wale maen ye anu ɔ, afoɛ nyɔ ɛhe; nakoso waha afoɛ nnu bɔ yeɛ bɛngɔyɔ eboo na banya aleɛ ɔ. 7Na Nyameɛ somane me maa nnili ɛmɔ nyunu kyɛbɔ ɛmɔ boso ngonua wɔ aseɛ ye aso ɔ, amaa ɛmɔ bosofoɛ pee anya ngoa. 8Yiti nna ɛmɔ yeɛ ɛmɔfale me bɛwale wa ɔ, na mmom Nyameɛ ɔ; na wamaa maayɛ Faro foɛtulɛfoɛ panyi, ɔne ye awuro amukoraa so meneɛ, na nza nde Misraim maen mukoraa so hene. 9 Yiti ɛ́mɔhã bɛ nwo bɛhɔ me baba berɛ beese ye kyɛ, Ɛwa Yosef nwa: Nyameɛ ayɛ me Misraim amukoraa so meneɛ; yiti ma wɔ nwo yɛ nyera na bra me nwo wa. 10Ɛkɔɔtena Gosen mbɔtam, ɛkɔtena kopingye me, ɛne wɔ mma ne wɔ nnomaa mɔ, ɔne wɔ mmoaen ne wɔ nandwie mɔ, ɔne wɔ nningyein amukoraa. 11Mengɔma hwee ngohia wɔ wɔ berɛ, ofikyɛ ɛhɔen piri ne, waha afoɛ nnu. Anyɔ a, ɛne w’awuro ama, ɔne bɔ ele ye amukoraa nwo kɔhyere bɛ.” 12Ɔtoale so sele oliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, “Ɛmɔ nye tua, yeɛ nniɛma Benyamin koso nye tua kyɛ me bɔbɔ deinn yeɛ me ne ɛmɔ yɛdwudwo ye. 13Ɛ́mɔhã me diberɛ bɔ nne ye wɔ Misraim ɔne bɔ ɛmɔanwu ye amu behyire me baba. Ɛ́mɔhã bɛ nwo bɛɛfa me baba bɛbra wa.” 14Afei ɔto brale oliɛma Benyamin osuni, na Benyamin koso to brale ye suni. 15Na ɔfele oliɛma nemɔ amukoraa bɛ noa, na ɔtotɔle bɛ nu suni. Ye si ye, oliɛma nemɔ ne ye belili ngɔmɔ.
16Na Faro awuro ama tele kyɛ, “Yosef aliɛma mɔ awa” nen, ɔyɛle Faro ne ye mbanyi mɔ fɛ paa. 17Yeɛ Faro sele Yosef kyɛ, “Ka kyire eliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔwura aleɛ bɛsoasoa ɛmɔ ngaka nemɔ na ɛmɔsa bɛhɔ Kanaan aseɛ so; 18na ɛmɔɔfa ɛmɔ ase ne ɛmɔ awuro ama mɔ bɛbra me wa. Na Misraim aseɛ ne, ngɔma ɛmɔ nekaa bɔ ɔte paa paa ɔ, ná ɛmɔanya aseɛ ne aso aleɛ paa bali.’ 19Na sá hyɛ bɛ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔfa teaseɛnam mɔ béfi Misraim maen nu na ɛmɔɔfa ɛmɔ mma ne ɛmɔ aye mɔ, na ɛ́mɔfa ɛmɔ ase bɛbra. 20Nnɛma ɛmɔdwene ɛmɔ agyapadeɛ bɔ ɔkɔha dɔ nwo, ofikyɛ Misraim aseɛ so nningyein paa amu te ɛmɔ deɛ.’ ”
21Yisrael mma nemɔ yɔle sɔ. Yosef mane bɛ teaseɛnam mɔ kyɛbɔ Faro hyɛle ne, na ɔmane bɛ aleɛ bɔ bekoli ye atunu ɔ. 22Ɔmane ebiala ataadeɛ bɔ ɔyɛ nyemene ko, nakoso Benyamin de, ɔmane ye ɛdwetɛ kɔyɛ kilo nza ne ndaadeɛ nyemene ahoroɔ nnu. 23Na ɔfale nningyein hemɔ manene ye baba: afunum nyii buru bɔ bafa Misraim nningyein paa basoa bɛ, afunum mmeleɛ buru bɔ basoa bɛ aburoo, paanoo, ɔne aleɛ bɔ ye baba koli ye atee nu ɔ. 24Oguale oliɛma nemɔ ate, na besi nu nen, osele bɛ kyɛ, “Nnɛma ɛmɔkɔko atee nu oo.” 25Yiti befili Misraim, na beedwuli bɛ se Yakob berɛ wɔ Kanaan aseɛ so. 26Na bɛbɔle ye amaneɛ kyɛ, “Yosef tɛ te ase, na odi hene wɔ Misraim aseɛ mukoraa so.” Na ye ti anu yɛle ye nnaa, ofikyɛ wanne bɛ wanni. 27Nakoso bɛhane bɔ Yosef aha ahyire bɛ ne amu behyirele Yakob. Na Yakob nwuni teaseɛnam mɔ bɔ Yosef asoma kyɛ bɛfa bɛɛfa ye nen, ye kra wale ye nwo. 28Na Yisrael sele kyɛ, “Ɔte nahorɛ, mma Yosef tɛ te ase; ngɔhɔ ngoonwu ye koraka né mawu.”

Title: GYENESISE 46
Content:
Yakob ne ye awuro ama kɔ Misraim
1Yiti Yisrael, bɛ besa bɛfrɛ ye Yakob ne sesale ye nwo nningyein amu, na ɔpene atee so. Oodwuli Beɛ Hyeba, na ɔbɔle afɔleɛ mane ye baba Yisake Nyameɛ. 2Na Nyameɛ dwudwo hyirele Yisrael kɔngɔen ne wɔ nyekyire nu. Ɔfrɛle ye: “Yakob, Yakob,” na osurole kyɛ, “Me ɛhe.” 3Na osele kyɛ, “Me ole Nyameɛ, wɔ baba ye Nyameɛ, nnɛsuro kyɛ ɛkɔhɔ Misraim, ofikyɛ ngɔma wɔ bosofoɛ kɔyɛ maen kandinga wɔ dɔ.” 4Me bɔbɔ me ne wɔ kɔhɔ Misraim, na ngosa ngɔfa wɔ bosofoɛ ngɔwa sɔ aseɛ ye aso; na Yosef yeɛ okogua wɔ noa nu nzue ɔ.” 5Yakob sili nu fili Beɛ Hyeba. Na Yisrael mma nemɔ fale bɛ baba, bɛ mma mɔ, ɔne bɛ ye mɔ tenatenane teaseɛnam mɔ bɔ Faro fa somane kyɛ bɛfa bɛɛfa ye nemɔ anu. 6 Yakob ne ye sasofoɛ amu fale bɛ nyɛmmoa ne bɛ nningyein bɔ benyane ye wɔ Kanaan aseɛ so ne, na bɛwale Misraim. 7Ɔne ye mma mmienzua mɔ, yeɛ afei ye mma mmienzua nemɔ bɛ mma mmienzua ne mmrasua, ye mma mmrasua mɔ, ɔne ye sasofoɛ amukoraa yeɛ bɛwale Misraim ɔ.
8 Yisrael sasofoɛ bɔ bɛwale Misraim nemɔ ɛhe: Yakob ne ye mma mɔ. Yakob bamuɛbaa Ruben, 9yeɛ afei Ruben mma mɔ: Hanoke, Palu, Hesron ne Karemi. 10Simeon mma mmienzua mɔ: Yemuel, Yamin, Ohade, Yakin, Soha yeɛ Sɔɔlo bɔ oni te Kanaanniɛ ne. 11Lewi mma mmienzua mɔ: Gɛsɔn, Kohate ne Merari. 12Yuda mma mɔ: Ɛre, Onan, Hyela, Pɛrɛse ɔne Sera (nakoso Ɛre ne Onan bewuli wɔ Kanaan aseɛ so). Pɛrɛse mma mɔ ole Hesron ne Hamul. 13Yisaka mma mmienzua mɔ: Tola, Puwa, Yob ne Simron. 14Sebulɔn mma mmienzua mɔ: Serede, Elon ne Yaleel. 15(Lea mma mmienzua bɔ Yakob ne ye wole wɔ Padan Aram mɔ ɛhe. Ɔwa brasua ole Dina. Ye mma ne ye nnomaa mɔ bɛ somaa te aburasa ne nza.) 16Gade mma mmienzua mɔ ɛhe: Sifion, Hagyi, Suni, Esebon, Ɛri, Arode ne Areli. 17Asɛ mma mmienzua mɔ ɛhe: Yimina, Yisua, Yisuwi, Beria, ɔne b’eliɛma brasua Sera. Beria mma mmienzua mɔ ɛhe: Heberi ne Malkiɛl. 18(Silpa, bɔ Laban fale ye mane ɔwa brasua Lea maa ɔɔyɛle ye afaneɛ ne, ɔne Yakob bɛ mma ne bɛ nnomaa buru ne nzia nemɔ ɛne). 19Yakob aye Rahɛl, ye mma mmienzua mɔ ɛhe: Yosef ne Benyamin. 20 Yosef ne Asenate bɔ ɔte On sɔfo Pɔtifɛra awa brasua ne, bɛwole Manase ne Efraim wɔ Misraim maen nu. 21Benyamin mma mmienzua mɔ ɛhe: Bela, Bekya, Asebel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rohye, Mupim, Hupim ne Ade 22(Rahɛl ne Yakob bɛ mma ne bɛ nnomaa, bɛ mukoraati bɛte buru ne nna). 23Dan awa bienzua ɛhe: Husim. 24Nafetali mma mɔ ɛhe: Yaseel, Guni, Yesare, ɔne Silem. 25(Bilha bɔ Laban fale ye mane ɔwa brasua Rahɛl kyɛ ɔɔyɛ ye afaneɛ ne, ɔne Yakob bɛ mma ne bɛ nnomaa mukoraa te nzoo). 26Yakob ye bɔbɔ ye sasofoɛ mukoraa bɔ ɔne bɛ wale Misraim ne, sɛ ɛye ye mma mmienzua nemɔ bɛ ye mɔ esie ahameɛ a, bɛ mukoraa bɛte aburasia ne nzia. 27 Yosef mma bɔ ɔwole bɛ wɔ Misraim nemɔ te nyɔ; Yakob ne ye awuro ama bɔ bɛwale Misraim ne amukoraa bɛte aburasoo.
Yakob ne ye awuro ama kofite Misraim
28Yakob somane Yuda maa olili ye nyunu moa hɔle Yosef berɛ kyɛ Yosef ohyire ye Gosen atee, na bɛwale Gosen mbɔtam. 29Yosef siesiele ye teaseɛnam na ɔfole ooyiale ye baba Yisrael wɔ Gosen. Ɔfale ye nwo hyirele ɔse; ɔtɔle ye nu, na ɔfale ye ti tole ye kɔme anwo suni hyɛle paa. 30Na Yisrael sele Yosef kyɛ, “Afei de mewu po a, mekuro, ɔnate kyɛ manwu wɔ nyunu, na manwu kyɛ ɛte ase.” 31Na Yosef sele oliɛma mɔ ne ɔse awuro ama nemɔ kyɛ, “Ngɔhɔ Faro berɛ ngɔɔbɔ ye amaneɛ kyɛ, ‘Nniɛma mɔ ne me baba awuro ama bɔ né bɛwɔ Kanaan aseɛ so ne, bawa me wa. 32Bɛte mmoaenneafoɛ, ofikyɛ besie ngaka; na bafa bɛ mmoaen ne bɛ nandwie mɔ ne bɛ nwo nningyein mukoraa bawa wa.’ 33Sɛ Faro frɛ ɛmɔ na obisa kyɛ, ‘Nzikyɛ adwuma yeɛ ɛmɔyɔ ɔ?’ a, 34ɛ́mɔbua ye kyɛ, ‘Ofi yɛ ngwadaa nu bɔ ɔbaadwu ɛnɛ ye, wɔ ngoaa mɔ de, yɛte mmoaenneafoɛ kyɛ yɛ nana mɔ ala.’ Sɛ ɔba ye sɔ a, ɔkɔmaa ɛmɔkɔtena Gosen mbɔtam, ofikyɛ Misraimfoɛ kyi mmoaenneafoɛ kɔkɔkɔkɔ.”

Title: GYENESISE 47
Content:
1Yiti Yosef hɔle ɔɔbɔle Faro amaneɛ kyɛ, “Me baba ne nniɛma mɔ, bɛ ne bɛ mmoaen, bɛ nandwie, ɔne bɛ nningyein mukoraa bafi Kanaan aseɛ so bawa, na kekesaala ye bɛwɔ Gosen mbɔtam.” 2Yosef yele oliɛma nemɔ anu nnu, na ɔne bɛ hɔle kyɛ beesoma Faro. 3Na Faro bisale oliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ adwuma yeɛ ɛmɔyɔ ɔ?” Na bebuale Faro kyɛ, “Wɔ ngoaa mɔ te mmoaenneafoɛ kyɛ yɛ nana mɔ ala.” 4Bɛtoale so besele Faro kyɛ, “Yawa kyɛ yɛbaatena maen ye anu, ofikyɛ wɔ ngoaa mɔ, yɛnnya aleɛ yɛmma yɛ ngaka mɔ. Ɛhɔen piri bɔ ɔwɔ Kanaan aseɛ so ne noa yɛ se paa. Yiti kekesaala ye, yɛsrɛ wɔ, maa wɔ ngoaa mɔ yɛtena Gosen mbɔtam.” 5Yeɛ Faro sele Yosef kyɛ, “Wɔ baba ne eliɛma mɔ bawa baaboka wɔ so wɔ wa. 6Misraim aseɛ ne wura wɔ sa, ma wɔ baba ne eliɛma mɔ bɛtena aseɛ ne nekaa bɔ ɔkye aleɛ paa ɔ. Maa bɛtena Gosen mbɔtam, na sɛ ɛse bɛ nu biemɔ bɔ bɛkɔhora a, maa bɛnea me nyɛmmoa deɛ mɔ bɛma me.”
7Afei Yosef mane ye baba Yakob wale oosomane Faro, na Yakob yirale Faro. 8Na Faro bisale Yakob kyɛ, “Ali afoɛ nyɛɛ?” 9Yakob buale Faro kyɛ, “Mahyini aseɛ ye aso afoɛ ɛyaa ko ne aburasa; m’afoɛ ne anzo pee, ye somaa ndwu afoɛ bɔ me nana mɔ lili ɔ, nakoso ɛfɛɛ wɔ nu paa.” 10Yakob yirale Faro, na ofili Faro nyunu berɛ ɔhɔle. 11Yeɛ Yosef bɔle ɔse ne oliɛma mɔ atenaseɛ, na ɔmane bɛ aseɛ bɔ ɔkye aleɛ paa wɔ Ramese mbɔtam wɔ Misraim maen nu, kyɛbɔ Faro hyɛle ne. 12Na Yosef mane ɔse ne oliɛma mɔ ne ɔse awuro ama mukoraa bɛ noa aleɛ, kyɛbɔ ebiala ye sasofoɛ somaa te ɔ.
Ɛhɔen piri ne anu yɛ se
13Né aleɛ nne aseɛ ne aso nekaa biala; ofikyɛ ɛhɔen piri ne anu yɛle se paa, ɔnate sɔ ati né Misraim maen ne Kanaan maen nu mmenia mukoraa bɛ́teetee. 14Né Misraim aseɛ so ne Kanaan aseɛ so sikaa mukoraa waali Yosef berɛ, ɔnate aburoo bɔ bɛtɔle befili ye berɛ ne ati, na Yosef fale esikaa ne hɔle Faro awuro. 15Na mmerɛ bɔ Misraimfoɛ ne Kanaanfoɛ bɛ sikaa amu yiele ne, Misraimfoɛ amukoraa wale Yosef berɛ beesele ye kyɛ, “Ma yɛ aleɛ; aso odi kyɛ yɛwuwu wɔ wɔ nyunu wa? Yɛ sikaa mukoraa ayie.” 16Yeɛ Yosef sele bɛ kyɛ, “Sɛ ɛmɔ sikaa amu ayie a, nzaade ɛ́mɔfa ɛmɔ nyɛmmoa mɔ bɛbra maa mva nzesã aleɛ mma ɛmɔ.” 17Yiti bɛfale bɛ nyɛmmoa bɛbrɛle Yosef, na Yosef mane bɛ aleɛ ɔfa sesane bɛ mbɔngɔ mɔ, bɛ mmoaen, bɛ nandwie mɔ ne afunum mɔ. Ɔmane bɛ aleɛ ɔfa sesane bɛ nyɛmmoa mukoraa sɔ afoɛ ne. 18Na sɔ afoɛ ne sone nen, ye afoɛ bieku besa bɛwale ye berɛ beesele ye kyɛ, “Yɛngɔfa ngɔfea me mene kyɛ yɛ sikaa mukoraa ayie, na nandwie nemɔ baali yɛ mene sa nu, na ɛhwee nne berɛ bɔ yɛkɔfa yɛkɔbrɛ me mene ɔ, sana yɛ nipadua ɔne y’aseɛ ala. 19Nzu ati yeɛ odi kyɛ yɛwuwu wɔ wɔ nyunu wa ma y’aseɛ mɔ ka berɛ ɔ? Tɔ yɛ ne y’aseɛ ná ma yɛ aleɛ, na yɛkɔyɛ Faro ngoaa, na yɛ aseɛ ayɛ ye deɛ. Ma yɛ aburoo bɔ yɛkolua ɔ, amaa yanwuwu, na mmom yanya yɛ ti yadidi nu, na aseɛ ne koso wanna berɛ mbaen.”
20Yiti Yosef tɔle Misraim aseɛ ne amu mane Faro. Ɔnate ɛhɔen piri bɔ né ɔdosa mmenia ne ati, Misraimfoɛ amukoraa tɔnetɔnene b’aseɛ. Aseɛ ne ɔɔyɛle Faro deɛ, 21na mmenia ne de, ofi Misraim sorɔ bɔ ɔkwaadwu ye ngwaen, Yosef maa bɛyɛle Faro ngoaa. 22Asɔfo nemɔ aseɛ angome yeɛ wandɔ ɔ; ofikyɛ asɔfo nemɔ de, né Faro tua bɛ kerɛ, na bɛfale sɔ akatuaa ne bɛneane bɛ nwo, yiti bandɔne b’aseɛ deɛ mɔ. 23Yiti Yosef sele mmenia nemɔ kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔtie, ɛnɛ kyẽa ye, matɔ ɛmɔ ne ɛmɔ aseɛ mama Faro. Aburoo bɔ bedua ɛhe. Ɛ́mɔlua ye wɔ aseɛ ne aso. 24Sɛ buberɛ dwu a, ɛmɔkɔhyɛ fieso aleɛ ne anu nnu: ko kɔyɛ Faro deɛ na nna ayɛ ɛmɔ deɛ. Ɛmɔkolua bie fieso, na ɛmɔ ne ɛmɔ awuro ama ne ɛmɔ mma mɔ bali bie.” 25Na besele ye kyɛ, “Ale yɛ ngoa, maa me mene ɔpene so, na yɛkɔyɛ Faro ngoaa.” 26Yiti Yosef hyɛle mmeraa fale Misraim aseɛ nwo, bɔ ɔtɛwɔ berɛ ɔbaadwu ɛnɛ ɔ, kyɛ fieso nningyein biala bɛkyɛ nu kure nnu a, ko te Faro deɛ; asɔfo nemɔ aseɛ ngome yeɛ wanyɛ Faro deɛ ɔ.
Yakob nzamanzeɛ
27Yiti Yisrael tenane Gosen mbɔtam wɔ Misraim maen nu. Benyane agyapadeɛ wɔ berɛ, na bɛwowole bɛyɛle pee. 28Na Yakob tenane Misraim aseɛ so afoɛ buru ne nzoo. Yiti Yakob lili afoɛ ɛyaa ko ne aburanna ne nzoo.
29 Na mmerɛ bɔ Yisrael wue pingyele ne, ɔfrɛle ɔwa Yosef sele ye kyɛ, “Sɛ anya alo me a, ye de fa wɔ sa bawura me sɔ abo, na hyɛ ɛbɔ kitii kyɛ ekoli nahorɛ kɔma me: Sɛ mewu a, nnɛsie me wɔ Misraim. 30Na mmom maa ngɔnna nekaa bɔ me mbanyi mɔ la ɔ; fa me fi Misraim na kosie me wɔ me mbanyi mɔ asieleɛ.” Na Yosef buale ye kyɛ, “Yoo, ngɔyɔ ye kyɛbɔ aha ne ala.” 31Yakob toale so kyɛ, “Ta ndaen kyire me.” Na Yosef tale ndaen hyirele ye. Na Yisrael bɔle ye nu ase fale ye ti kisale mba ne sorɔ.

Title: GYENESISE 48
Content:
Yakob yira Efraim ne Manase
1Na ɛhe asi ne, bɛɛbɔle Yosef amaneɛ kyɛ, “Wɔ baba nde apɔ.” Yiti ɔfale Manase ne Efraim bɔ bɛte ye mma nyɔ ne bokale ye nwo so. 2Na ebie sele Yakob kyɛ, “Ɛwa Yosef awa wɔ wa.” Yiti Yisrael kendene ye nwo tenane ye mba ne aso. 3 Na Yakob sele Yosef kyɛ, “Ɛdangama Nyameɛ yele ye nwo ali hyirele me wɔ Luse bɔ ɔwɔ Kanaan aseɛ so. Oyirale me, 4na osele me kyɛ, ‘Ngɔmaa ɛkɔwo na wɔ boso atrɛ; ngɔma wɔ boso ama kɔyɛ mmeni kure pee, na ngɔfa aseɛ he ngɔhyɛ wɔ ne wɔ boso ama afebɔɔ.’ 5Na afei wɔ mma mmienzua nyɔ nemɔ bɔ ɛwole bɛ wɔ Misraim koraka yeɛ meba wɔ wa wɔ Misraim nen, mekyire Efraim ɔne Manase, bɛte me deɛ; bɛkɔyɛ me mma kyɛbɔ Ruben ne Simeon bɛte ne ala. 6Ngwadaa bɔ ɛkɔwo bɛ nziɛ ye de, bɛte wɔ deɛ; na sɛ ɔba agyapadeɛ hyɛlɛ nu a, b’eliɛma nemɔ dumaa yeɛ ɔkɔla bɛ deɛ so ɔ. 7 Ofikyɛ mvi Padan méba ne, atee nu, ɔhale kãa maa yɛdwu Efrate ne, Rahɛl wuli Kanaan aseɛ so mane me wora bɔle, na nziele ye wɔ Efrate (bɔ ye ole Betlehem) atee nu.”
8Na Yisrael nwuni Yosef mma nemɔ nen, obisale kyɛ, “Na nwa mɔ ɛhe?” 9Yosef buale ye baba kyɛ, “Me mma mɔ bɔ Nyameɛ afa bɛ alo me wɔ wa ɛne.” Na Yakob sele ye kyɛ, “Mesrɛ wɔ, fa bɛ pingye me nwo wa maa nyira bɛ.” 10Ɔnate enyinɛ ti, né Yisrael nye ayɛ wusiwusi maa onnwu nikye. Yiti Yosef fale bɛ pingyele ye, na Yisrael fele bɛ noa tɔle bɛ nu. 11Yisrael sele Yosef kyɛ, “Mandwene kyɛ ngonwu wɔ nyunu ko le, nakoso nea kyɛ Nyameɛ amaa manwu wɔ mma mɔ koso po ɔ.” 12Yosef pagyale ngwadaa nemɔ fili Yisrael gya so, na Yosef kunduni fale ye nyunu butuli berɛ. 13Na Yosef fale bɛ munyɔ pingyele ɔse. Ɔfale ye sa famaa sɔle Efraim nu maa oolili Yisrael sa bɛen so, yeɛ ɔfale ye sa bɛen sɔle Manase nu maa oolili Yisrael sa famaa so. 14Yisrael tengyɛle ye sa famaa fa tole Efraim bɔ yeɛ ɔte kãa ne ti so, na ɔfale ye sa beale nu fale bɛen ne tole Manase so, ɔwɔ nu kyɛ né Manase yeɛ ɔte bamuɛbaa ɔ de. 15Na oyirale Yosef kyɛ,
“Nyameɛ bɔ me mbanyi mɔ Abraham ne Yisake bɛsole ye ne,
Nyameɛ bɔ wagyina me si me wiase bɔ mmale maa waadwu ɛne ye,
16abɔfo bɔ aye me afi musue mukoraa nu ɔ, yira mmɛɛmaa ye;
maa ɔnate bɛ so, me dumaa, ɔne me mbanyi mɔ Abraham ne Yisake dumaa otira ndii;
ma bɛ boso ama bɛsone na bɛyɛ pee wɔ aseɛ ye aso.”
17Na Yosef nwuni kyɛ ye baba afa ye sa famaa wato Efraim ti so nen, wanyɛ ye fɛ; yiti ɔyele ye baba sa fili Efraim ti so fa tole Manase ti so. 18Yeɛ Yosef sele ye baba kyɛ, “Daabi, baba, ɛhe yeɛ ɔte bamuɛbaa ɔ, yiti fa wɔ sa famaa ne to ye ti so.” 19Nakoso ye baba ambene, na osele kyɛ, “Mese, mma mese, ɛhe koso kɔyɛ maen, ye koso ɔkɔyɛ sona titire, nakoso oliɛma kãa ne koli mu kɔtra ye, na ye bosofoɛ kɔyɛ maen maen pee.” 20 Yiti oyirale bɛ sɔ kyẽa ne, na osele kyɛ,
“Ɔnate wɔ so yeɛ maen Yisrael kɔha sɔ saleɛ dwirɛ he ɔ:
‘Nyameɛ ma ɛyɛ kyɛ Efraim, na ɔ́ma ɛyɛ kyɛ Manase.’ ”
Yiti Yakob nate sɔ atee he aso bɔle Efraim panyi wɔ Manase so. 21Yeɛ Yisrael sele Yosef kyɛ, “Mebaawu, nakoso Nyameɛ kogyina ɛmɔ si, na okosa kɔfa ɛmɔ kɔhɔ ɛmɔ nana mɔ aseɛ so. 22Afei koso, aseɛ ko bɔ ɔla bokaa Sɛkem ndoroleɛ nu, bɔ mvale me ngrandɛ ne me agyaen ngo nnele mvili Amorifoɛ sa nu ne, mafa mama wɔ; mamva mamma eliɛma nemɔ.”

Title: GYENESISE 49
Content:
Yakob yirayira ye mma mɔ
1Yakob frɛfrɛle ye mma mɔ, na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔboaboa ɛmɔ noa ma nga bɔ kyẽa bie okosi ɛmɔ bra nu ɔ ngyire ɛmɔ.
2“O Yakob mma, ɛ́mɔyia na ɛ́mɔtie,
ɛ́mɔtie ɛmɔ ase Yisrael.
3Ruben, wɔ yeɛ ɛte me bamuɛbaa ɔ,
m’anwoserɛ, me sɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ oli moa bɔ okyire kyɛ nde bienzua ɔ,
w’anidie tra so, yeɛ wɔ tumi koso tra so.
4Ɛwosowoso kyɛ nzue, yiti wɔ panyililɛ ne kɔbɔ wɔ,
ofikyɛ ɛne ɛse aye bɛlale;
ɛɛlale me bɛen so, eguale ye nwo fiɛ.
5Simeon ne Lewi te aliɛmaa,
bɛ ngrandɛ mɔ te nzɛmmɔne akodeɛ
6Ao me kra, nnɛne bɛ fa adwene;
Ao me sunzum, nnɛne bɛ bɔ afɛ;
ofikyɛ sɛ bɛfɛ yaa a, bedi awue,
na bɛgye bɛ nye a, bɛpepɛ nandwie mɔ gya ndii nu.
7Musue to b’ɛyaafɛlɛ ne, ofikyɛ ye noa yɛ hye;
ɔ́hã b’ɛyaafɛlɛ piri ne koso, ofikyɛ atianuserɛ wɔ nu!
Ngɔhyehyɛ bɛ bosofoɛ nu wɔ Yakob maen ne anu,
na mato bɛ mapete Yisrael maen nu.
8Yuda, eliɛma mɔ kɔkamvo wɔ,
na ɛkɔfo kɔtena wɔ pɔfoɛ mɔ kɔme so;
ɛse amma mmienzua mɔ kɔkoto wɔ.
9 Yuda te gyata akrɔngrɔma,
bɔ eku ngaka di ná esa bada wɔ boso ɔ.
Okunduni, na obutuli berɛ kyɛ gyata,
ɔte kyɛ gyata beleɛ; nwa yeɛ onzuro bɔ okotingye ye ɔ?
10Ɛhɔtɔ ngofi Yuda sa nu,
yeɛ ahennie pɔmaa ngofi ye gya afia,
kɔpem kyɛ mmenia kotua ndɔ bɛkɔma ye ɔ,
kɔpem kyɛ maen maen kɔyɛ sotie bɛkɔma ye ɔ.
11Na ɔkɔmenda ye pɔngɔ akrɔngrɔma kɔbɔ bobe nu,
na wamenda ye afunum ba wabɔ bobe paa nu,
na ɔpo ye ndaadeɛ wɔ nzaa nu,
na wapo ye tena wɔ bobe nzaa bɔ ɔyɛ fɛ nu;
12Ɔkɔno nzaa somaa biala bɔ okuro ɔ,
ná nyɔfonesue ama ye gye ayɛ hyɛnn.
13Sebulɔn kɔtena mboanoa,
ɔkɔyɛ ɛlɛen mɔ agyinaleɛ,
na ɔne Sidon bɛkɔbɔ ɛwɛen.
14Yisaka te afunum anwoserɛniɛ,
obutu mmoaen kure mɔ afia;
15na onwuni kyɛ nekaa bɔ bede bɛ nwome te paa,
na sɔ aseɛ ne yɛ nyemene,
yiti ɔhane ye bati ase fa soale nningyein ne,
na bɛhyɛle ye maa ɔyɛle kanganiɛ adwuma.
16Dan kobua ye mmenia ndɛen,
kyɛbɔ Yisrael mmusua kure ngaa nemɔ yɔ ne ala.
17Dan kɔyɛ atunu ewoo,
na wayɛ atimbire so ɛbɔnaa,
bɔ ɔkeka pɔngɔ gya ndii nu ɔ,
maa pɔngɔhanɛniɛ ne ɔte tɔ ye si ɔ.
18Ao AWURADE, wɔ ngoalelɛ yeɛ menea ye ate ɔ.
19Apaabɔlɛfoɛ kure kohwi kɔfa Gade so,
nakoso ɔkɔkakyi ye nwo kɔbɔ bɛ so apaa.
20Asɛ aleɛ kɔyɛ bɔ ɔte aleɛ paa ɔ,
na ɔkɔma mmenia sa kɔha aleɛ bɔ ɔfata ɛhene mɔ ɔ.
21Nafetali te wanzane beleɛ bɔ basangye ye ɔ,
bɔ ofifi mmɛen nyemene ɔ.
22Yosef te bakaa mmaen frɔmfrɔm bɔ osu ɔ,
bakaa mmaen frɔmfrɔm bɔ osu ná opingye asue ti ɔ;
ye mmaen bua kogua fasue so.
23Agyaentolɛfoɛ dwɔsole tiale ye serɛserɛ,
bɛfale agyaen bɛneane ye so bɛtole, na bɛtanene ye nye paa;
24nakoso wando ye agyaen ne,
Ɔnate Yakob ye Tuminiɛ ne ye anwoserɛ ti,
ye abasa nu kɔyɛ se.
(Ɔnate Mmoaenneafoɛ bɔ yeɛ ɔte Yisrael Nyɔbotaen ne dumaa nu).
25Wɔ baba ye Nyameɛ yeɛ ɔkɔboka wɔ ɔ,
Ɛdangama Nyameɛ yeɛ okoyira wɔ ɔ,
ɔkɔfa nyameɛso anwuro anwuro saleɛ yeɛ okoyira wɔ ɔ;
aseɛ bo dɔ saleɛ buma bɔ ɔtrɛ ɔ,
nyɔfone ne aworɛ nu saleɛ yeɛ ɔkɔfa koyira wɔ ɔ.
26Saleɛ bɔ ofi ɛse berɛ ne,
ɔtra saleɛ bɔ ofi mmokaa mbiri bɔ otimu berɛ daa nu ɔ.
Ɔtra nningyein paa bɔ bɛwɔ daa tete mmokaa bɔ bɛwɔ berɛ afebɔɔ nu ɔ;
ma sɔ saleɛ ne ɔ́bra Yosef so,
ye bɔ baye ye basie ahameɛ bafi oliɛma nemɔ anu.
27Benyamin te pataku bɔ ɔkye ngaka di ɔ,
ngyerɛmɔ odi naen bɔ ye sa kɔsɔ ye nu ɔ,
na nɔsoa ɔkyekyɛ koɛ nu nzesadeɛ.”
28Yisrael mmusua kure buru ne nyɔ nemɔ ɛne. Na mmerɛ bɔ né bɛ baba óyira bɛ ne, edwirɛ bɔ ɔha hyirele bɛ hɔ ɛne; ɔfale saleɛ bɔ ɔfata bɛ nu biala yirale ye. 29Na ɔhyɛle bɛ kyɛ, “Waha kãa né matoa ne mbanyi mɔ. Ɔyɛ a ɛ́mɔsie me wɔ me nana mɔ asieleɛ; wɔ nyɔboɛ bɔ wasi sua bɔ yeɛ ɔwɔ Hitiniɛ Efron aseɛ so ne anu. 30 Mekyire nyɔboɛ bɔ wasi sua bɔ ɔwɔ Makepɛla aseɛ so, wɔ Mamre eyia afiteleɛ, wɔ Kanaan aseɛ so ne. Ɛhe yeɛ Abraham tɔ fili Hitiniɛ Efron berɛ kyɛ ɔfa yɛ ye asieleɛ ne. 31 Berɛ yeɛ besiele Abraham ne ɔye Sara; berɛ yeɛ besiele Yisake ne ɔye Rebɛka; na berɛ yeɛ nziele Lea ɔ. 32Aseɛ ne ɔne nu nyɔboɛ bɔ wasi sua ne, bɛtɔle befili Hitifoɛ sa nu.” 33 Na Yakob hane sɔ dwirɛ ne kitii hyirele ye mma nemɔ yiele ne, ɔpagyale ye gya guale mba ne aso, olele ye nwomeɛ bɔ ɔpɛ ye bo ɔ, na ɔhale nu.

Title: GYENESISE 50
Content:
1Yosef yakyili ye nwo tole ye baba so, ɔfele ye noa na osuni ye. 2Na Yosef hyɛle ye ngoaa safoɛ nemɔ kyɛ bewura ɔse fuin ne ayire amaa wamborɔ. Yiti bewurale Yisrael fuin ne ayire. 3Bɛfale eleburanna yeɛ bɛyɔle ɔ, ofikyɛ né eleburanna yeɛ bɛfa bewura efuin ayire ɔ. Na Misraimfoɛ suni ye eleburasoo.
4Na ngyẽa bɔ bɛfa besuni ye ne pɛle nu ne, Yosef sele Faro mbanyi kyɛ, “Sɛ ɛmɔanya baboka me sɔa de a, ye de mesrɛ ɛmɔ, ɛ́mɔfa bɛto Faro nyunu bɛma me kyɛ, 5 me baba maa ndale ndaen na ɔhane kyɛ, ‘Mebaawu, na kosie me wɔ Kanaan aseɛ so, wɔ asieleɛ bɔ mbɛ ndole berɛ kyɛ besie me wɔ nu ne anu.’ Yiti mesrɛ wɔ, maa ngonzie me baba na nza mmra.” 6Na Faro buale kyɛ, “Kɔ na kosie ɛse, kyɛbɔ ɔmaa ɛtale ndaen ne.” 7Yiti Yosef hɔle kyɛ ɔkwaasie ɔse; na Faro mbanyi amukoraa: mbanyi bɔ bɛwɔ Faro awuro, yeɛ Misraim maen ne anu mbanyi amukoraa, 8Yosef awuro ama mukoraa, oliɛma mmienzua mɔ, yeɛ afei ɔse awuro ama mɔ bɛbokale ye so bɛ ne ye hɔle. Bɛ mma mɔ ne bɛ mmoaen mɔ ne bɛ nandwie mɔ ngome yeɛ bɛhale Gosen aseɛ so ɔ. 9Teaseɛnam mɔ ne pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ bokale ye so bɛ ne ye hɔle; né ɛlɔen ne te piri paa. 10Beedwuli nekaa bɔ bɛboro aburoo wɔ Atade bɔ ɔwɔ asue Yɔɔdan asi dɔ ne, bɛbɔle awuye serɛserɛ bɔ ɔyɛ aworabɔ paa ɔ; na Yosef yɔle ɔse sɛen ɛlɛsoo. 11Na Kanaanfoɛ bɔ bɛte aseɛ ne asofoɛ nwuni ɛsɛen bɔ né bɛyɔ wɔ nekaa bɔ bɛboro aburoo wɔ Atade nen, bɛhane kyɛ, “Misraimfoɛ ɛsɛen piri paa ɛhe!” Yiti bɛfrɛle berɛ Abel Misraim. Ɔwɔ Yɔɔdan asi dɔ. 12Yiti Yakob mma mɔ yɔle kyɛbɔ ɔhyɛle bɛ ne ala mane ye; 13 ofikyɛ ye mma nemɔ soale ye hɔle Kanaan aseɛ so, na besiele ye wɔ Makepɛla aseɛ so nyɔboɛ bɔ wasi sua nu wɔ Mamre eyia afiteleɛ. Abraham tɔle sɔ nyɔboɛ ne ɔne aseɛ ne fili Hitiniɛ Efron berɛ kyɛ ɔfa yɛ ye asieleɛ. 14Na Yosef siele ye baba yiele nen, ɔne oliɛma mmienzua nemɔ, yeɛ bɛ bɔ beesomane ye maa osiele ye baba ne amukoraa, besa bɛwale Misraim.
Yosef sá hyɛ oliɛma mɔ bɔ
15Na Yosef aliɛma nemɔ nwuni kyɛ bɛ baba awu ne, besusuli ye nwo kyɛ, “Anyɔ a, né Yosef atu ye nye wasie yɛ so na watua yɛ bɔne bɔ yayɔ ye ne amu so kerɛ.” 16Yiti bɛmaa bɛɛhã behyirele Yosef kyɛ, “Wɔ baba hane sɔ dwirɛ ye kitii koraka yeɛ owu ɔ kyɛ, 17‘Ɛ́mɔhã behyire Yosef kyɛ, mesrɛ wɔ, fa eliɛma mɔ amumuyɛɛ ne bɛ bɔne kyɛ bɛ, ofikyɛ bɛyɔle wɔ tɛɛ paa.’ Yiti afei, yɛsrɛ wɔ, fa wɔ baba ye Nyameɛ ngoaa mɔ b’amumuyɛɛ kyɛ bɛ.” Na bɛhane ɛhe behyirele Yosef ne, osuni. 18Oliɛma nemɔ koso wale beebutubutuli ye nyunu na besele kyɛ, “Yɛte wɔ ngoaa.” 19Nakoso Yosef sele bɛ kyɛ, “Nnɛma ɛmɔsuro. Aso ngɔhora ngole Nyameɛ adwuma ngɔyɔ anaa? 20Ɛmɔ de, ɛmɔambena me ne paa, nakoso Nyameɛ nhyehyɛleɛ maa ɔkakyili paa; kyɛ ɔnate so okole mmeni pee ngoa, kyɛbɔ afei wala ali ye. 21Yiti nnɛma ɛmɔsuro, na ngɔnea ɛmɔ ne ɛmɔ mma mɔ.” Yiti ɔkyekyele bɛ wora mane bɛ kunu tɔle bɛ fɔnwoo.
Yosef wue
22Yosef ne ɔse awuro ama bɛtenane Misraim, na Yosef lili afoɛ ɛyaa ko ne buru. 23Yosef nwuni Efraim ye nana nganzowa mɔ po, na bɛwole Manase awa Makyiri mma bɛtole Yosef gya so. 24Yeɛ Yosef sele oliɛma nemɔ kyɛ, “Mebaawu, nakoso Nyameɛ kɔɔnea ɛmɔ. Na aseɛ bɔ ɔtale ye nwo ndaen hyirele Abraham ne Yisake ne Yakob ne, ɔkɔye ɛmɔ kofi aseɛ he aso ɔkɔfa ɛmɔ kɔhɔ so.” 25 Yosef mane Yisrael mma nemɔ tale ndaen hyirele ye, na ɔhane kyɛ, “Nyameɛ kɔɔye ɛmɔ kofi wa. Na sɛ ɔba ye sɔ a, ɛ́mɔsoa me mmowue béfi wa bɛhɔ.” 26Yiti Yosef wuli, mmerɛ bɔ né wali afoɛ ɛyaa ko ne buru ɔ. Bewurale ye ayire bɔ wamma wamborɔ ɔ, na bɛfale ye bɛtole alaka nu wɔ Misraim.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO BƆ OLI MOA
Content:
BƆ OLI MOA
Dumaa ƐKSADƆSO bo kyire: “AMANDUO.” Amanduo ne te edwirɛ bɔ ohia paa wɔ Yisraelfoɛ abakɔsɛm nu. Ɔka kyɛbɔ Nyameɛ nate tumi piri so yele ye mmenia Yisraelfoɛ fili Misraim ngoaasolɛ nu. Besa bɛfrɛ Yisraelfoɛ Hebrifoɛ. Bahyɛ ƐKSADƆSO nwomaa ne anu nna: (1) Kyɛbɔ Nyameɛ yele Hebrifoɛ fili ngoaasolɛ nu ɔ; (2) Bɔ ɔtole bɛ atunu alaa maa beedwuli Sinai bokaa ne anwo; (3) Nyameɛ ne ye mmenia Hebrifoɛ bɛyɛle apam, apam bɔ okyire bɛ atee bɔ ɔsɛ kyɛ bɛfa so bɛso ye ná bɛbɔ bɛ bra ɔ; (4) Besili ɛtena sua bɔ bɛkɔsɔne Nyameɛ nu ɔ, besiesiele nu, na Nyameɛ mane bɛ ɔsɔfolilɛ ne ɛsɔnenɛ nwo mmeraa.
Nwomaa ne maa yɛnwu nningyein bɔ Nyameɛ yɔle, wɔ mmerɛ bɔ ɔyele ye mmenia fili Misraim ngoaasolɛ nu, ná afei ɔmaa bɛyɛle maen bɔ bele kyẽa bie anyelasoɛ ɔ.
Sona bɔ odi dwumaa paa wɔ nwomaa ne anu ole Mose, ofikyɛ ye yeɛ Nyameɛ fale ye tuale ye mmenia noa ɔ. Nwomaa he anu yeɛ Nyameɛ fale Mmeraa Buru ne mane Yisraelfoɛ ɔ (20.1-17).
Nu Dwirɛ
Yisraelfoɛ nya fawɔnwodi fi Misraimfoɛ sa nu 1.1—15.21
a. Bɛyɛ ngoaa wɔ Misraim 1.1-22
b. Mose aworɛ ne ye ngwadaa nu 2.1—4.31
d. Mose ne Aarɔn fa bɛ dwirɛ to Misraim hene nyunu 5.1—11.10
e. Beku Abɔtra boaen; betu befi Misraim 12.1—15.21
Befi Ɛpo Kɔkorɛ nwo bekoodwu Sinai bokaa ne anwo 15.22—18.27
Mmeraa ne ne Apam ne 19.1—24.18
Ɛtena sua ne ɔne ɛsɔnenɛ nwo mmeraa 25.1—40.38

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 1
Content:
Bɛhyɛ Yisraelfoɛ anyeborolɛ wɔ Misraim
1 Yisrael mma bɔ bɛ ne Yakob wale Misraim ne, bɛ nu biala ne ye abusua yeɛ ɔwale ɔ. Ye mma nemɔ dumaa ɛhe: 2Ruben, Simeon, Lewi, Yuda, 3Yisaka, Sebulɔn, Benyamin, 4Dan, Nafetali, Gade ne Asɛ. 5 Né Yakob boso ama ne amukoraa bɛte aburasoo; na né Yosef de ɔwɔ Misraim dada. 6Afei Yosef wuli, na oliɛma nemɔ amukoraa ne sɔ aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ ne amukoraa bewuli. 7Nakoso Yisrael boso ama nemɔ wowole, bɛ boso trɛle, na bɛ nwo yɛle se. Yiti beyili maen ne anu tɛkyɛ.
8Na ɛhene foforɛ bie bɔ né ɔnze Yosef oolili Misraim bia ne. 9Na osele ye mmenia nemɔ kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔnea, Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ asone soma, na b’anwoserɛ bo yɛ so. 10 Ɛ́mɔma yɛfa bɛ yɛfa nworɛ atee bie aso. Anyɔ a bɛkɔsone pee, na sɛ koɛ bie ba a, bɛkɔɔboka yɛ pɔfoɛ mɔ ná baho batia yɛ, ná banya atee banwati bafi maen ye anu.” 11Yiti bɛyeyele adwumayɔlɛfoɛ so mbanyi maa belili bɛ so, kyɛ bɛhyɛ bɛ ma bɛyɔ adwuma bɔ ɔbo bɛ so ɔ. Na bɛkyekyele nguro Pitom ne Ramese maa Faro fa yɛle nekaa bɔ osie ye nningyein ɔ. 12Nakoso bɛwɔ so bɛ́hyɛ bɛ anyeborolɛ maa ɔbo so nen, bekye po yeɛ né bɛ́kɔ so bɛsone ná bɛtrɛ ɔ. Na Misraimfoɛ surole Yisraelfoɛ paa. 13Yiti bɛhyɛle Yisraelfoɛ anyeborolɛ maa bɛyɔle adwuma serɛ paa bɛmane bɛ. 14Bɛmane bɛ wora bɔle, ofikyɛ bɛhyɛle bɛ maa bɛyɔle adwuma bɔ ɔbo bɛ so wɔ nnɛterɛ ne mmerekese pɛlɛ nu, fieso adwuma ahoroɔ nu; na bɛhyɛle bɛ anyeborolɛ paa wɔ adwuma biala nu.
15Afei Misraim hene sele Hebri mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ, bɔ bɛ nu ko li Sifra, ná ko wora li Pua ne kyɛ, 16“Sɛ ɛmɔde Hebri mmrasua aworɛ, ná awoleɛ nu berɛ, ɛmɔnwu kyɛ adɔma ne te bienzua a, odi kyɛ ɛmɔku ye. Sɛ ɔte brasua de a, nnɛma ɛmɔku ye.” 17Nakoso né mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ ne suro Nyameɛ, yiti banyɔ bɔ Misraim hene hyɛle bɛ kyɛ bɛyɔ ne, na mmom bɛmane mmienzua nemɔ nyane bɛ ti didili nu. 18Yiti Misraim hene frɛle mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ ne, na obisale bɛ kyɛ, “Nzu ati yeɛ ɛmɔayɔ sɔ ye, bɔ ɛmɔama mmienzua nemɔ anya bɛ ti badidi nu ye?” 19Na mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ ne buale Faro kyɛ, “Hebri mmrasua nemɔ de, bɛtte kyɛ Misraim mmrasua nemɔ; ofikyɛ bɛ nwo te kyerekyerɛɛ, na bɛwo koraka né sona bɔ ode aworɛ ne adwu berɛ.” 20Yiti Nyameɛ lole mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ ne, na Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ wora bɛ boso trɛle, na bɛtale pembepembe. 21Na ɔnate kyɛ mmrasua bɔ bede aworɛ ne besuro Nyameɛ ne ati, ɔmaa bɛ koso bɛbɔle taen. 22Na Faro hyɛle ye mmenia ne amukoraa kyɛ, “Bienzua biala bɔ Hebrifoɛ kɔwo ye ne, ɛ́mɔgyi ye bɛto asue Naele nu, nakoso brasua biala de, ɛ́mɔma onya ngoa.”

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 2
Content:
Mose aworɛ
1Biaa bie bɔ ofi Lewi abusua nu oogyale Lewi abusua nu braa. 2 Braa ne nwonzɛle, na ɔwole baa bienzua. Na onwuni kyɛ ye nwo yɛ nyemene nen, ɔfale ye feale toonn bosome nza. 3Afei de, né ɔfa ye fea a ɔnyɛ yee ko, yiti ɔfale elemmire kɛndɛen, ɔfale pɔweɛ nzue ne ehwaa fale ye nwo, ɔfale adɔma ne tole nu, na ɔɔfale ye siele ngyɛngyɛma nu wɔ asue Naele noa. 4Na adɔma n’aliɛma brasua oogyinane dedeede neane bɔ ɔkɔto adɔma ne ɔ. 5 Faro awa brasua wale kyɛ ɔbaabia asue ne anu. Né ye abaawa nemɔ natenate asue ne noa. Onwuni kyɛ kɛndɛen ne gyi ngyɛngyɛma ne anu, na ɔsomane ye abaawa ne ko kyɛ ɔɔfa bra. 6Obukyele so nen, onwuni adɔma bienzua bɔ osũ ɔ. Ɔyɛle ye anwumvo, na ɔhane kyɛ, “Hebrifoɛ mma ne bie ɛne.” 7Na adɔma n’aliɛma brasua ne bisale Faro awa brasua ne kyɛ, “Ngɔmvrɛ Hebri mmrasua nemɔ ko mmrɛ wɔ ma ɔma adɔma ne nyɔfone ma wɔ anaa?” 8Na Faro awa brasua ne buale ye kyɛ, “Yoo, kɔ.” Na abaayaa ne ɔɔfrɛle adɔma ne maame wale. 9Na Faro awa brasua ne sele ye kyɛ, “Fa adɔma ne kɔma ye nyɔfone ma me, na ngotua wɔ kerɛ.” Yiti braa ne fale ye hɔle ɔɔmane ye nyɔfone. 10Akwadaa ne nyini, na ɔɔfale ye mane Faro awa brasua ne. Ɔfale ye yɛle ɔwa, na ɔtole ye dumaa Mose, ofikyɛ ɔhane kyɛ, “Nzue nu yeɛ nyele ye mvili ɔ.”
Mose nwati kɔ Midian
11 Mose nyini ne, ɛlɛho bie ɔɔpasale oliɛma mɔ Hebrifoɛ nwo, na onwuni adwuma serɛ bɔ né bɛ́hyɛ bɛ maa bɛyɔ ɔ. Na onwuni kyɛ Misraimniɛ bie ɔ́bo oliɛma Hebrifoɛ nemɔ anu ko ɔ. 12 Ɔtotole ye nye bra yiale, na onwuni kyɛ sona biala nne berɛ nen, ohuni Misraimniɛ ne, na ɔfale ye feale anweaa nu. 13Aleɛ hyene ne, ofitele, edwirɛ nwanwa, onwuni Hebrifoɛ nyɔ kyɛ bɛ́ko ɔ. Na obisale bɔ ye dwirɛ nyɛ fɛ ne kyɛ, “Nzu ati yeɛ ɛ́bo eliɛngo ɔ?” 14 Na obuale kyɛ, “Nwa yeɛ ɔyɛle wɔ yɛ so panyi ne ndɛenbualɛniɛ ɔ? Ɛpena kyɛ eku me kyɛbɔ ehuni Misraimniɛ ne anaa?” Yiti edwirɛ ne mane Mose surole, na ɔhane ye ye ti anu kyɛ, “Eh, edwirɛ ne afite amba!”
15 Na Faro tele sɔ dwirɛ nen, ɔyɛle kyɛ okohu Mose. Nakoso Mose nwatili Faro, na ɔɔtenane Midian maen nu wɔ abura bie anwo. 16Né Midian sɔfo le mmaa mmrasua nzoo, na bɛwale berɛ kyɛ bɛbaato nzue begua nningyein bɔ bɛ baba nyɛmmoa no nu nzue ne anu. 17Mmoaenneafoɛ biemɔ wale bɛɛfoane bɛ, nakoso Mose dwɔsole, ohuru gyinane bɛ si, na ɔmane mmoaen nemɔ nzue. 18Na besa bɛwale bɛ baba Rewel berɛ nen, obisale bɛ kyɛ, “Nzu ati yeɛ ɛnɛ de ɛmɔawa ndɛ sɔa ye?” 19Bebuale kyɛ, “Misraimniɛ bie lele yɛ fili mmoaenneafoɛ nemɔ sa nu, ɔtole nzue mane yɛ po, na ɔmane yɛ mmoaen nemɔ nzue.” 20Na obisale ye mma mmrasua nemɔ kyɛ, “Ɔwɔ nisua? Nzu ati yeɛ ɛmɔayakyi biaa ne dɔ ɔ? Ɛmɔɔfrɛ ye ma oodidi.” 21Mose penene so ɔne biaa ne bɛtenane, na ɔfale ɔwa brasua Sipora mane Mose gyale. 22Sipora wole baa bienzua, na Mose tole ye dumaa Gɛsɔm, ɔnate kyɛ Mose hane kyɛ, “Maayɛ ɛwɔfoɛ wɔ amanvrafoɛ aseɛ so.”
23Afoɛ pee pɛle nu, na Misraim hene wuli. Afei Yisraelfoɛ nwuni ngoaasolɛ nu amaneɛ piri paa; bɛbɔle awuye, na bɛ suɛ wɔ ngoaasolɛ nu ne dwuli Nyameɛ nyunu. 24 Nyameɛ tele b’awuyebɔlɛ ne, na ɔkayele apam bɔ ɔne Abraham, Yisake ne Yakob bɛyɛle ne. 25Nyameɛ neane Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ, na bɛyɛle ye anwumvo.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 3
Content:
Nyameɛ frɛ Mose
1Né Mose yeɛ ɔnea ye sia Yɛtro, bɔ ɔte Midian sɔfo ne mmoaen so ɔ. Ɛlɛho bie, ɔhane mmoaen ne hɔle dedeede wɔ ɛserɛ ne noa dɔ paa, na oodwuli Nyameɛ bokaa Horebo nye abo. 2 Na AWURADE abɔfo yele ye nwo ali hyirele ye wɔ ngyɛkyerɛ bie bɔ né ogye wuronyiwuronyi nu. Mose neane, edwirɛ nwanwa, onwuni kyɛ ngyɛkyerɛ ne ogye de, nakoso né ɔnyera. 3Na Mose hane kyɛ, “Edwirɛ nwanwa he de, mémakye mékɔ dɔ mekɔnea nikyee ti bɔ ɔmma ngyɛkyerɛ ne nyera ne.” 4Na AWURADE nwuni kyɛ wamakye wafa dɔ ɔkwaanea nen, ɔfrɛle ye fili ngyɛkyerɛ ne anu kyɛ, “Mose! Mose! Na osurole kyɛ, “Me ɛhe.” 5 Na AWURADE hane kyɛ, “Nnɛpingye wa! Puropuro wɔ gya nu mbaboa ne, ofikyɛ nekaa bɔ egyi ne te aseɛ krongron.” 6 Na ɔfa sɔle so kyɛ, “Me ole wɔ baba Nyameɛ ne, Abraham Nyameɛ ne, Yisake Nyameɛ ne Yakob Nyameɛ ne. Na Mose fale ye nyunu feale, ofikyɛ né osuro kyɛ ɔkɔnea Nyameɛ ɔ.
7Na AWURADE hane kyɛ, “Me mmenia bɔ bɛwɔ Misraim ne, manwu b’amaneɛnwunɛ ne, na mate awuye bɔ b’adwuma so mbanyi mɔ maa bɛbɔ ne. Manwu b’amaneɛnwunɛ ne. 8Na madwu mawa ase kyɛ mebaale bɛ mefi Misraimfoɛ sa nu, ná meye bɛ mefi sɔ aseɛ ne aso mekɔ aseɛ paa bɔ ɔtrɛ ɔ so, aseɛ bɔ nyɔfonesue ne woɛ tengyɛ wɔ so ne: Kanaanfoɛ, Hitifoɛ, Amorifoɛ, Perisifoɛ, Hiwifoɛ ne Yebusifoɛ maen ne. 9Afei de, awuye bɔ Yisraelfoɛ bɛbɔ ne wadwu me nyunu, na manwu ɛhyɛlɛ bɔ Misraimfoɛ bɛhyɛ bɛ ne. 10Yiti bra. Mésoma wɔ maa ɛkɔ Faro berɛ ɛkɔye me mmenia Yisraelfoɛ efi Misraim!” 11Nakoso Mose bisale Nyameɛ kyɛ, “Me ole nwa bɔ mékɔ Faro berɛ mekɔye Yisraelfoɛ mefi Misraim ɔ?” 12Na Nyameɛ sele ye kyɛ, “Ngoli wɔ si. Na bɔ okohyire kyɛ me yeɛ mésoma wɔ ɛhe: sɛ ɛye maen ne fi Misraim ba a, sɔ bokaa he aso yeɛ ɛmɔkɔsɔne Nyameɛ ɔ.”
13Na Mose bisale Nyameɛ kyɛ, “Sɛ mekɔ Yisraelfoɛ berɛ, ná mekã mekyire bɛ kyɛ, ‘Ɛmɔ nana mɔ Nyameɛ yeɛ wasoma me ɔ,’ ná bɛ wora bebisa me kyɛ, ‘Ye dumaa li sɛɛ’ a, nzikyɛ dwirɛ yeɛ nga ngyire bɛ ɔ?” 14Na Nyameɛ buale Mose kyɛ, “ME ALA OLE ME ALA.” Na osele kyɛ, “Bɔ ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛkã kyire Yisraelfoɛ hɔ ɛhe: ‘ME ALA asoma me ɛmɔ berɛ.’ ” 15Nyameɛ sa sele Mose kyɛ, “Kã kyire Yisraelfoɛ kyɛ, ‘AWURADE ɛmɔ nana mɔ Nyameɛ ne, Abraham Nyameɛ ne, Yisake Nyameɛ ne, Yakob Nyameɛ ne yeɛ wasoma me ɛmɔ berɛ ɔ.’ Me dumaa bɔ ɔwɔ berɛ afebɔɔ hɔ ɛne, na ɛhe yeɛ aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ mukoraa bɛkɔfa bɛkɔfrɛ me ɔ. 16Kɔ! Kɔboaboa Yisrael mbanyi mɔ noa, ná kã kyire bɛ kyɛ, ‘AWURADE ɛmɔ nana mɔ Nyameɛ ne, Abraham Nyameɛ ne, Yisake Nyameɛ ne, Yakob Nyameɛ ne, waye ye nwo ali wahyire me. Ɔnwa: ‘Maanea ɛmɔ, na manwu nikyee bɔ bɛfa bɛyɔ ɛmɔ wɔ Misraim ne. 17Na mayɛ m’adwene kyɛ ngɔye ɛmɔ ngofi Misraim amaneɛnwunɛ nu, ná mafa ɛmɔ mahɔ Kanaanfoɛ, Hitifoɛ, Amorifoɛ, Perisifoɛ, Hiwifoɛ ne Yebusifoɛ aseɛ ne aso, aseɛ bɔ nyɔfonesue ne woɛ tengyɛ wɔ so ne.
18“Bekotie wɔ dwirɛ, na ɛne Yisrael mbanyi bɛhɔ Misraim hene berɛ beese ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE, Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne, ɔne yɛ ayia. Yiti yɛsrɛ wɔ, ma yɛ ate ma yɛhɔ atee bɔ bɛfa ɛlɛsa bɛpɛ ɔ wɔ ɛserɛ so, ná yɛɛbɔ afɔleɛ yɛma AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ne.’ 19Me de, mese kyɛ Misraim hene ngɔma ɛmɔ ate ma ɛmɔngɔhɔ, sana tumi piri bie hyɛ ye so koraka. 20Yiti ngɔtengyɛ me sa ngɔfa anwanwadeɛ mukoraati bɔ ngɔyɔ ye Misraim ne ngotia Misraim, na ɛhe asi ne, ɔkɔma ɛmɔ kɔhɔ. 21Ngɔma Misraimfoɛ kɔlo mmenia hemɔ, amaa sɛ ɛ́mɔfi berɛ a, ɛmɔangɔ ye nzanza. 22Yisrael brasua biala kobisa ɛdwetɛ ne sikaa kɔkorɛ mbembenanneɛ ne ndena kofi Misraim brasua bɔ ɔne ye bɛte bepingye ɔ berɛ, ɔne Misraim brasua biala bɔ ɔte ye awuro ɔ berɛ, na ɛmɔkɔfa sɔ nningyein ne bekosiesie ɛmɔ mma mmienzua ne mmrasua mɔ nwo. Na ɛhe kɔmaa ɛmɔkonya koɛ nu nzesadeɛ bekofi Misraimfoɛ berɛ.”

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 4
Content:
Nyameɛ ma Mose tumi nwanwasoɛ
1Na Mose buale kyɛ, “Sɛ banne me banni, anaakyɛ bandie me dwirɛ, ná bɛka kyɛ, ‘AWURADE anye ye nwo ali wangyire wɔ huu’ ɛ?’ ” 2Na AWURADE bisale ye kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ yeɛ otira wɔ sa nu ye?” Obuale kyɛ, “Pɔmaa ɔ.” 3Na AWURADE sele kyɛ, “Gyi to aseɛnwo berɛ!” Ogyi tole berɛ, na ɔkakyili ewoo. Na Mose pimbini ye si fili ye nwo. 4Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Tengyɛ wɔ sa sɔ ye dua ne anu.” Ɔtengyɛle ye sa sɔle ye nu, na ɔkakyili pɔmaa wɔ ye sa nu. 5Na AWURADE sele kyɛ, “Ɛhe kɔmaa bekole bekoli kyɛ AWURADE, bɛ nana mɔ Nyameɛ ne, Abraham Nyameɛ ne, Yisake Nyameɛ ne, Yakob Nyameɛ ne yeɛ waye ye nwo ali wahyire wɔ ɔ.” 6Na AWURADE sá sele ye kyɛ, “Fa wɔ sa wura wɔ hue so.” Ɔfale ye sa wurale ye hue so, na ɔyele ye sa fili ye hue so nen, né kwata ayɛ ye sa ne amaa wayɛ fufue kyɛ asukɔtwea. 7Na AWURADE sele ye kyɛ, “Fa wɔ sa wura wɔ hue so bieku.” Ɔfale ye sa wurale ye hue so bieku, na ɔyele ye sa ne fitele nen, né wasa wakakyi kyɛ ye nwonaen ngaa ne ala. 8Na Nyameɛ sele kyɛ, “Sɛ banne wɔ banni, anaakyɛ banne sɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ oli moa ne bando nu a, bekole bɔ ɔtɔ so nyɔ ne bekoli. 9Na sɛ banne sɔ nzɛngyerɛnneɛ nyɔ ne po banni, anaa bandie wɔ dwirɛ a, ye de sa asue Naele nzue ne bie, ná hwie gua aseɛ wosee so. Na Naele nu nzue bɔ ɛkɔsa ne kɔkakyi mogya wɔ aseɛ wosee ne aso.”
10Na Mose sele AWURADE kyɛ, “Mesrɛ wɔ, AWURADE. Ofi me tetetete bɔ ɔbaadwu ɛnɛ bɔ ɛne w’akoaa bedwudwo ye, nnde sona bɔ ye noa ate ɔ; me dwudwolɛ te nyaanyaa, na me temverema abutu.” 11Na AWURADE bisale ye kyɛ, “Nwa yeɛ ɔyɔle kuro sona noa ɔ? Nwa yeɛ ɔmaa ɔyɛ emumu anaa asotiniwaaniɛ, ɔmaa onwu nikye anaa ɔyɛ ye anyesiniwaaniɛ ɔ? Yiti nna me AWURADE ɔ? 12Yiti kɔ, na ngɔma wɔ noa kɔte ná mahyire wɔ bɔ ɛha ɔ.” 13Nakoso Mose sele kyɛ, “Yieee! AWURADE, mesrɛ wɔ ala, soma sona foforɛ.”
14Afei AWURADE fɛle Mose so yaa maa ɔhane kyɛ, “Eliɛma Aarɔn, bɔ ɔte Lewiniɛ ne, ɔnne berɛ hɔ ɔ? Mese kyɛ ye noa ate. Tie, wasi nu ɔbaayia wɔ, na sɛ onwu wɔ a, ɔkɔyɛ ye fɛ soma. 15Ka edwirɛ ne kyire ye, ná fa edwirɛ ne tua ye noa; na ngɔmaa ɛne ye ɛmɔ noa kodwu dwaa nu, ná mahyire ɛmɔ bɔ ɛmɔhã ɔ. 16Okogyina wɔ gya nu kodwudwo kohyire mmenia ne, wɔ noa dwirɛ kotua ye noa, ná wɔ wora ayɛ kyɛ Nyameɛ ama ye. 17Fa pɔmaa he tira, na ye yeɛ ɛkɔfa kɔyɔ nzɛngyerɛnneɛ ɔ.”
Mose sá kɔ Misraim
18Mose sá hɔle ye sia Yɛtro berɛ, na osele ye kyɛ; “Mesrɛ wɔ, maa nza ngɔ nniɛma mɔ berɛ wɔ Misraim, ná ngɔnea sɛ bɛtɛ te ase a.” Na Yɛtro sele Mose kyɛ, “Kɔ asomdwee nu oo.”
19 Na AWURADE sele Mose wɔ Midian kyɛ, “Sá kɔ Misraim, ofikyɛ bɛ bɔ né bɛpena wɔ beku wɔ ne, bɛ mukoraa bawu.” 20Yiti Mose fale ɔye ne ye mma mmienzua nyɔ ne tenatenane afunum so, na osa hɔle Misraim aseɛ so. Na ɔfale Nyameɛ pɔmaa ne tirale.
21Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Sɛ esa kɔ Misraim a, nea kyɛ anwanwadeɛ mukoraa bɔ mama wɔ tumi kyɛ ɛyɔ ne, ɛkɔyɔ ye Faro nyunu. Nakoso ngɔma ye so kɔyɛ se, bɔ ɔnate so ɔngɔma me mmenia nemɔ ngɔhɔ ɔ. 22Afei ka kyire Faro kyɛ, ‘AWURADE nwa: Yisrael te me bamuɛbaa bienzua. 23Na mekã mekyire wɔ kyɛ, “Ma mma ne ɔhɔ ɔɔsɔne me.” Na sɛ amma ye ate ma wangɔ a, ngohũ wɔ bamuɛbaa bienzua.’ ”
24Na Mose sili nu ne, AWURADE yiale ye wɔ asikyeleɛ bie anu wɔ atunu, na ɔyɛle kyɛ okohu Mose. 25Nakoso Sipora fale twerɛboɛ bie pɛle ɔwa ne bienzua, ɔfa hane Mose gya, na ɔhane kyɛ, “Amba, ɔnate sɔ amaneɛ he aso, aayɛ me bɔbɔ deinn me busuaniɛ!” 26Yiti AWURADE yakyili ye. Na ɔnate bienzuapɛlɛ ne ati, Sipora sele kyɛ, “Ɛte mogya nu atɔmvorɛ biaa.”
27AWURADE sele Aarɔn kyɛ, “Kɔ ɛserɛ so dɔ koyia Mose.” Yiti ɔhɔle, oyiale ye wɔ Nyameɛ bokaa ne anwo, na ɔfele ye noa. 28Mose fale AWURADE dwirɛ bɔ wafa wasoma ye ne amukoraa, ɔne nzɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ wahyɛ ye kyɛ ɔyɔ ne nwo amaneɛ bɔle Aarɔn. 29Afei Mose ne Aarɔn hɔle bɛɛboaboale Yisrael mbanyi mukoraa noa. 30Aarɔn fale edwirɛ amukoraa bɔ Nyameɛ aha ahyire Mose ne tole dwaa, na ɔyɔle nzɛngyerɛnneɛ ne wɔ mmenia ne nyunu berɛ. 31Mmenia ne le lili. Na bɛtele kyɛ AWURADE aapasa Yisraelfoɛ nwo, ná wanwu b’amaneɛnwunɛ nen, bɛbɔle bɛ ti ase bɛsɔnene ye.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 5
Content:
Mose ne Aarɔn gyi Faro nyunu
1Nziɛ ye, Mose ne Aarɔn hɔle Faro berɛ beesele ye kyɛ, “AWURADE Yisrael Nyameɛ nwa: ‘Ma me mmenia nemɔ bɛhɔ, ná beeli aluolue bɛma me wɔ ɛserɛ so.’ ” 2Nakoso Faro buale kyɛ, “AWURADE ne ole nwa bɔ ɔsɛ kyɛ metie ye ná mema Yisraelfoɛ bɛkɔ ɔ? Menze sɔ AWURADE ne, yeɛ Yisraelfoɛ koso mengɔma bɛngɔhɔ!” 3Na besele kyɛ, “Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne ɔne yɛ ayia, yiti yɛsrɛ wɔ, ma yɛ ate ma yɛhɔ atee bɔ bɛfa ɛlɛsa bɛpɛ ɔ wɔ ɛserɛ so, ná yɛɛbɔ afɔleɛ yɛma AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ne; na anyɔ a né wafa ewue anwonyerɛ anaa ngrandɛ wawa yɛ so.” 4Nakoso Misraim hene sele bɛ kyɛ, “Mose ne Aarɔn, nzu ati yeɛ ɛmɔpena kyɛ bɛma mmenia ne yakyi b’adwuma bɔ bɛyɔ ne ɔ? Ɛmɔhɔ bɛɛtoa ɛmɔ adwuma serɛ ne aso!” 5Na Faro sá sele kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔtie, afei bɔ maen ne anu mmenia asone pee ne yeɛ ɛmɔmaa bɛyakyi adwumayɔlɛ ɔ!”
6Sɔ kyẽa ne ala, Faro hyɛle maen adwumayɔlɛfoɛ mɔ so mbanyi, yeɛ adwumayɔlɛfoɛ mɔ so neafoɛ mɔ kyɛ, 7“Nnɛmɔma mmenia nemɔ ɛserɛ ko maa bɛpɛ mmerekese kyɛbɔ daa ne ɛmɔyɔle ne, na mmom ɛ́mɔma bɛ bɔbɔ bɛɛpena ɛserɛ ne. 8Mmerekese somaa bɔ né bɛpɛ ye daa ne, ɛ́mɔma bɛ́pɛ sɔ ala. Nnɛma ɛmɔte so, ofikyɛ bɛte foen, na ɛhe ati yeɛ ɔmaa besu kyɛ, ‘Maa yɛhɔ yɛɛbɔ afɔleɛ yɛma yɛ Nyameɛ ne.’ 9Ɛ́mɔma mmenia nemɔ adwuma bɔ ɔyɛ se paa ma bɛyɔ, amaa bandie nnakannaka dwirɛ biala.
10Yiti maen adwumayɔlɛfoɛ mɔ so mbanyi, yeɛ adwumayɔlɛfoɛ mɔ so neafoɛ mɔ hɔle beesele mmenia ne kyɛ, “Faro nwa: ‘Mengɔma ɛmɔ ɛserɛ ko.’ 11Ɛmɔ bɔbɔ bɛɛpena ɛserɛ wɔ nekaa biala bɔ ɛmɔkonya bie ɔ; nakoso ɛmɔ adwuma ne de, yɛngɔte so kaala. 12Yiti mmenia ne tele bɛ nwo guale Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa bɛɛboaboale atokoɔ mmakaa wuruwaa noa bɛfa bɛkakyili ɛserɛ. 13Adwumayɔlɛfoɛ so mbanyi nemɔ hane bɛ bo kyɛ, “Odi kyɛ ɛmɔyie ɛmɔ daa daa adwuma ne, kyɛbɔ ɛserɛ wɔ berɛ ne ɛmɔyɔle ne ala!” 14Bɛbole Yisrael mbanyi bɔ Faro adwumayɔlɛfoɛ mɔ so mbanyi afa adwuma ne awura bɛ sa ne, na bebisale bɛ kyɛ, “Mmerekese somaa bɔ ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔpɛ ye anoma ne ɛnɛ ne, nzu ati yeɛ ɛmɔambɛ ye mu, kyɛbɔ dáa ɛmɔpɛ ne?”
15Afei Yisrael mbanyi bɔ bafa adwuma ne bawura bɛ sa ne wale Faro berɛ beesuni behyirele ye kyɛ, “Nzu ati yeɛ ɛfa sɔ dwirɛ he di wɔ ngoaa ɔ? 16Bɛmma wɔ ngoaa ɛserɛ biala, nakoso bese yɛ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔpɛ mmerekese!’ Bɛbo wɔ ngoaa, nakoso mvomsoɛ ne fi wɔ mmenia ne.” 17Na Faro buale kyɛ, “Ɛmɔte foen, ɛmɔte foen soma! Sɔ ati yeɛ ɛmɔnwa: ‘Ma yɛ ate ma yɛɛbɔ afɔleɛ yɛma AWURADE’ ne. 18Ɛmɔhã bɛ nwo bɛɛyɔ adwuma! Bɛngɔma ɛmɔ ɛserɛ biala, nakoso mmerekese somaa bɔ ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔpɛ ne ala yeɛ ɛmɔkɔpɛ ɔ.” 19Yisrael mbanyi bɔ adwuma ne wura bɛ sa nwuni kyɛ edwirɛ ato bɛ, wɔ mmerɛ bɔ bɛha behyirele bɛ kyɛ, “Mmerekese somaa bɔ ɛlɛho biala ɛmɔpɛ ne, ɛmɔngɔte so.” 20Befili Faro berɛ bɛ́ba nen, bɛɛtole Mose ne Aarɔn kyɛ bɛnwondɛ bɛ. 21Na besele bɛ kyɛ, “Nyameɛ ɔ́nea ɛmɔ na óbua ɛmɔ ndɛen, ofikyɛ ɛmɔamaa yayɛ tɛɛ wɔ Faro ne ye mbanyi nyunu, na ɛmɔafa ngrandɛ bawura bɛ sa nu kyɛ behũ yɛ.”
Mose bɔ Nyameɛ somoɛ
22Afei Mose sá sele AWURADE kyɛ, “Oo AWURADE, nzu ati yeɛ ama edwirɛ sɔaa ato mmenia ye mɔ ɔ? Nzu ati yeɛ ɛsomane me ɔ? 23Ofi mmerɛ bɔ mmale Faro berɛ, ná ndwudwole wɔ dumaa nu ɔ, ɛhalɛ alaa yeɛ ɔha mmenia ye mɔ ɔ, nakoso ɛyyɔle wɔ mmenia ye mɔ bɛ lelɛ nwo hwee.”

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 6
Content:
1Na AWURADE buale Mose kyɛ, “Afei de, ɛbaanwu nikyee bɔ ngɔfa ngɔyɔ Faro ɔ. Ofikyɛ, tumi piri kɔha ye kɔme asi maa ɔkɔyakyi bɛ maa bɛkɔhɔ; tumi piri kɔha ye kɔme asi maa ɔkɔfoa bɛ kofi ye aseɛ so.”
Mose frɛlɛ nwo dwirɛ bieku
2Nyameɛ sele Mose kyɛ, “Me ole AWURADE. 3Nyele me nwo ali ngyirele Abraham, Yisake ne Yakob kyɛ nde Tuminiɛ Nyameɛ. Nakoso me dumaa YAHWE (AWURADE) ne de, mamma bangyina so bannwu me. 4Mene bɛ koso yɛyɛle m’apam, kyɛ ngɔfa Kanaan aseɛ bɔ bɛɛtenane so bɛyɛle ɛwɔfoɛ ne ngɔma bɛ. 5Asa koso, Yisraelfoɛ bɔ Misraimfoɛ afa bɛ ayɛ nganga ne, mate awuye bɔ bɛbɔ ne, na makaye m’apam ne. 6Yiti ka kyire Yisraelfoɛ kyɛ, “Me ole AWURADE, na ngɔye ɛmɔ ngofi Misraim amaneɛnwunɛ nu, ná male ɛmɔ mafi bɛ ngoaasolɛ nu. Na ɔnate tumi asaa ne asohwenɛ mbiri mbiri so yeɛ ngɔfa ngole ɛmɔ ɔ. 7Ngɔfa ɛmɔ ngɔyɛ me mmenia, ná me wora ngɔyɛ ɛmɔ Nyameɛ. Na ɛmɔkonwu ye kyɛ me ole AWURADE ɛmɔ Nyameɛ bɔ olele ɛmɔ fili Misraim amaneɛnwunɛ nu ne. 8Aseɛ bɔ mata ndaen kyɛ ngɔfa ngɔma Abraham, Yisake ne Yakob nen, ngɔfa ɛmɔ ngɔhɔ so. Ngɔfa ngɔma ɛmɔ maa ɔkɔyɛ ɛmɔ deɛ. Me ole AWURADE.’ ” 9Mose hane sɔ dwirɛ ne hyirele Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ, nakoso ɔnate b’aba nu bɔ né wabu, ɔne ngoaasolɛ serɛserɛ bɔ né bɛwɔ nu ne ati, bandɛ ye so.
10Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, 11“Kɔ, kɔha kyire Misraim hene Faro kyɛ ɔyakyi Yisraelfoɛ mɔ ma befi ye aseɛ so bɛhɔ.” 12Nakoso Mose buale AWURADE kyɛ, “Yisraelfoɛ po bandie me, ɔkɔyɛ sɛɛ né Faro atie me, me bɔ me noa ɔttele ɔ?” 13AWURADE ne Mose ne Aarɔn dwudwole, na ɔhyɛle bɛ kyɛ bɛɛhã sɔ dwirɛ ne behyire Yisraelfoɛ, ɔne Misraim hene Faro, ná bɛ́ye Yisraelfoɛ béfi Misraim aseɛ so. 14 Mbanyi bɔ né bɛlela b’abusua nemɔ noa ɛhe: Yisrael bamuɛbaa Ruben ye mma mɔ: Hanoke, Palu, Hesron ne Karemi. Ruben abusua mɔ ɛne. 15Simeon mma mɔ: Yemuel, Yamin, Ohade, Yakin, Soha, yeɛ Sɔɔlo bɔ oni te Kanaanniɛ ne. Simeon abusua mɔ ɛne. 16 Lewi mma mɔ dumaa, kyɛbɔ b’aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ si te hɔ ɛhe: Gɛsɔn, Kohate ne Merari. Lewi afoɛ bɔ olili te ɛyaa ko aburasa ne nzoo. 17Gɛsɔn mma mɔ ɛhe: Libini ne Simei, bɛ ne b’abusua mɔ. 18Kohate mma mɔ ɛhe: Amram, Yisare, Hebron ne Yusiɛl. Kohate afoɛ bɔ olili te ɛyaa ko ne aburasa ne nza. 19Merari mma mɔ ɛhe: Maheli ne Musi. Lewi abusua nemɔ, kyɛbɔ b’aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ te ɛne. 20 Amram gyale ye baba aliɛma brasua Yokebɛde, na ɔne ye bɛwole Aarɔn ne Mose. Amram afoɛ bɔ olili te ɛyaa ko ne aburasa ne nzoo. 21Yisare mma mɔ ɛhe: Kora, Nefege ne Sikri. 22Yusiɛl mma mɔ ɛhe: Misael, Elsafan ne Sitri. 23Aarɔn gyale Aminadabo awa brasua Elihyeba bɔ oliɛma ole Nason ne. Na ɔne ye bɛwole Nadabo, Abihu, Eleasa ne Yitama. 24Kora mma mɔ ɛhe: Asire, Ɛlkana ne Abiasafe. Kora abusua mɔ ɛne. 25Aarɔn awa Eleasa gyale Putiel mma mmrasua nemɔ ko, na ɔne ye bɛwole Finehase. Lewi abusua kure ne, nu abusua mbanyi bɔ bɛlela ye noa ɛne. 26Aarɔn ne Mose ole mmenia bɔ AWURADE ha hyirele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔye Yisraelfoɛ béfi Misraim aseɛ so, kyɛbɔ bɛ kure kure si te ɔ.” 27Mose ne Aarɔn komapɛ ne ala yeɛ bɛfa bɛtole Misraim hene Faro nyunu kyɛ ɔ́ma Yisraelfoɛ bétu béfi Misraim ɔ.
Nyameɛ sá hyɛ Mose bɔ
28Kyẽa bɔ AWURADE ne Mose dwudwole wɔ Misraim aseɛ so ne, 29AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Me ole AWURADE. Kã edwirɛ bɔ mekã mekyire wɔ ne amukoraa kyire Misraim hene Faro.” 30Nakoso Mose buale AWURADE wɔ ye nyunu berɛ kyɛ, “Yieee! Me noa ɔttele, ɔkɔyɛ sɛɛ né Faro atie me dwirɛ?”

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 7
Content:
1Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Tie, mayɛ wɔ kyɛ Nyameɛ wɔ Faro nye so, na eliɛma Aarɔn kɔyɛ wɔ ngɔmhyɛlɛniɛ. 2Ka bɔ mahyɛ wɔ kyɛ ɛha ne amukoraati; na eliɛma Aarɔn kɔha kohyire Faro kyɛ ɔyakyi Yisraelfoɛ ate ma befi ye aseɛ so bɛhɔ. 3 Nakoso ngɔma Faro kɔyɛ asobrakyeɛ. Ɔwɔ nu kyɛ ngɔma me nzɛngyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ kɔsone pee wɔ Misraim aseɛ so de, 4nakoso Faro ngɔtɛ ɛmɔ so. Ngɔfa me tumi ngɔhwe Misraim so, na ngɔfa asohwenɛ piri so ngɔye me lɔen, me mmenia Yisraelfoɛ, ngofi Misraim aseɛ so. 5Na sɛ metengyɛ me sa wɔ Misraim so, ná meye Yisraelfoɛ mefi bɛ nu a, Misraimfoɛ konwu kyɛ me ole AWURADE.” 6Na kyɛbɔ AWURADE hyɛle Mose ne Aarɔn kyɛ bɛyɔ ne, sɔ ala yeɛ bɛyɔle ɔ. 7Mmerɛ bɔ bɛ ne Faro dwudwole nen, né Mose ali afoɛ aburawɔtwɛ, yeɛ Aarɔn koso afoɛ aburawɔtwɛ ne nza.
Aarɔn pɔmaa ne
8Na AWURADE sele Mose ne Aarɔn kyɛ, 9“Sɛ Faro ka kyire ɛmɔ kyɛ, ‘Ɛ́mɔyɔ sɛngyerɛnneɛ bie behyire a, ye de ka kyire Aarɔn kyɛ, ‘Gyi wɔ pɔmaa ne to Faro nyunu berɛ ma ɔkakyi ewoo.’ ” 10Yiti Mose ne Aarɔn hɔle Faro berɛ bɛɛyɔle kyɛbɔ AWURADE hyɛle bɛ ne. Aarɔn gyili ye pɔmaa ne tole Faro ne ye mbanyi mɔ nyunu berɛ, na ɔkakyili ewoo. 11Faro koso frɛfrɛle mmenia bɔ bɛse ase, ɔne musueyelɛfoɛ maa bɛwale, na sɔ Misraim ngonyaayelɛfoɛ nemɔ koso yele ngonyaa yɔle sɔ ala. 12Bɛ mukoraa begyili bɛ mbɔmaa nemɔ beguale aseɛnwo berɛ, na bɛkakyilikakyili ewoo mɔ. Nakoso Aarɔn pɔmaa ne memene bɛ mbɔmaa nemɔ. 13Bekye po yeɛ Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so ɔ, na wandɛ bɛ so, kyɛbɔ AWURADE hane ne ala.
Nzue kakyi mogya
14Afei AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Faro abubu mmakaa watua ye so, na ɔngɔpene ma mmenia ne ngɔhɔ. 15Kɔ Faro berɛ ngyerɛmɔ, mmerɛ bɔ ófite kɔ asue Naele noa ɔ. Kogyina asue ne noa berɛ nwondɛ ye, ná fa wɔ pɔmaa bɔ ɔkakyili ewoo ne tira. 16Na ka kyire ye kyɛ, AWURADE, Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne asoma me kyɛ mmanga ngyire wɔ kyɛ, ‘Ma me mmenia nemɔ bɛhɔ bɛɛsɔne me wɔ ɛserɛ so, nakoso abubu mmakaa atua wɔ so maa waadwu bekye.’ 17AWURADE nwa nyoo, ‘Bɔ ɔkɔmaa ekonwu ye kyɛ nde AWURADE ɛhe: Tie, ngɔfa pɔmaa bɔ otira me sa nu ne ngofĩ asue Naele nu, na nzue ne kɔkakyi mogya. 18Naen bɔ bɛwɔ asue Naele nu kowuwu, nzue ne kɔbo mvamva, na Misraimfoɛ ngɔhora ngɔno Naele nzue.’ ” 19Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Ka kyire Aarɔn kyɛ, ‘Fa wɔ pɔmaa ne, ná tengyɛ wɔ sa wɔ Misraim nzue mɔ so: b’asue mbiri mɔ, Naele sa mɔ, b’abura mɔ ne b’ɛkwaa mukoraa so ma bɛkakyi mogya. Misraim aseɛ ne aso mukoraa kɔyɛ mogya, bua ne angora mɔ anu po.’ ”
20Mose ne Aarɔn yɔle kyɛbɔ AWURADE hyɛle bɛ ne ala. Aarɔn mane ye pɔmaa ne aso hɔle anwuro wɔ Faro ne ye mbanyi mɔ nyunu berɛ, ɔfa fini asue Naele nu, na Naele nzue amukoraa kakyili mogya. 21Nzue ne anu naen wuwuli, na Naele nzue bone mvamvamvamva bɔ Misraimfoɛ angora bie no ɔ. Na Misraim aseɛ ne aso amukoraa yɛle mogya. 22Nakoso Misraim ngonyaayelɛfoɛ koso yele ngonyaa yɔle sɔ ala. Yiti Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wandɛ bɛ so, kyɛbɔ AWURADE hane ne ala. 23Faro sá hɔle ye awuro, na wamva ɛhe po wanyɛ dwirɛ. 24Na Misraimfoɛ amukoraa tutuli abura wɔ asue Naele noa bɛpenane nzue bɔ bɛkɔno ɔ, ofikyɛ bangora Naele nzue no.
25AWURADE sɛkyele asue Naele nen, ngyẽa ɛlɛsoo pɛle nu.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 8
Content:
Mborohyɛen manyamanya
1Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Kɔ Faro berɛ kose ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE nwa nyoo: Ma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bɛhɔ, ná bɛɛsɔne me. 2Nakoso sɛ amma bɛ ate ma bangɔ a, ngɔma mborohyɛen kɔto kɔpete maen ne anu amukoraa. 3Mborohyɛen koyi asue Naele nu to, bekofi nu bɛkɔwa w’awuro, bɛkɔwa wɔ sua nu ne wɔ bɛen so, wɔ mbanyi mɔ ne wɔ mmenia awuro, wɔ bokyea mɔ ne wɔ ngukue mɔ nu. 4Na mborohyɛen nemɔ kɔwa wɔ so, wɔ mmenia ne wɔ mbanyi mukoraa so.’ ”
5Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Ka kyire Aarɔn kyɛ, ‘Tengyɛ wɔ sa, ná fa wɔ pɔmaa ne kyire asue mbiri mɔ so, asue Naele sa mɔ so, ɔne ɛkwaa mɔ so, ná ma mborohyɛen yɛ Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa manyamanya!’ ” 6Yiti Aarɔn tengyɛle ye sa wɔ Misraim nzue mɔ so, na mborohyɛen mɔ wale bɛɛyɛle Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa manyamanya. 7Nakoso Misraim ngonyaayelɛfoɛ koso yele ngonyaa yɔle sɔ ala, na bɛmane mborohyɛen wale Misraim aseɛ so.
8Afei Faro frɛle Mose ne Aarɔn sele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔserɛ AWURADE bɛma ɔye mborohyɛen nemɔ ofi me ne me mmenia so, na ngɔma Yisraelfoɛ kɔhɔ ná baabɔ afɔleɛ bama AWURADE.” 9Na Mose sele Faro kyɛ, “Wɔ adaworoma, maa nwu mmerɛ horɛ bɔ nzrɛ ma wɔ, ɛne wɔ mbanyi mɔ ne wɔ mmenia, kyɛbɔ ɔkɔyɛ ná mborohyɛen nemɔ awuwu afi wɔ ne w’awuro mɔ so ɔ; asue Naele nu deɛ angome yeɛ ɔkɔha ɔ.” 10Na obuale kyɛ, “Ɛhema.” Na Mose koso hane kyɛ, “Ɔ́yɛ sɔ ala, kyɛbɔ aha ne, amaa ɔnate so anwu ye kyɛ ebiala nne berɛ bɔ ɔte kyɛ AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ne ɔ. 11Mborohyɛen nemɔ kofi wɔ ne w’awuro mɔ nu kɔhɔ, wɔ mbanyi ne wɔ mmenia so kɔhɔ, maa ɔkɔha bɛ bɔ bɛwɔ asue Naele nu angome.” 12Yiti Mose ne Aarɔn fili Faro nyunu berɛ bɛhɔle. Na Mose srɛle AWURADE fale mborohyɛen bɔ wafa wawa Faro so ne nwo dwirɛ tole ye nyunu. 13AWURADE yɔle bɔ Mose srɛle ye ne; mborohyɛen nemɔ wuwuli wɔ awuro nemɔ anu, aluo ne fieso. 14Bɛboaboale bɛ noa kure kure, na maen ne anu bone mvamvamvamva. 15Faro nwuni kyɛ bɛ nwo atɔ bɛ kãa, yiti obubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wandɛ bɛ so, kyɛbɔ AWURADE hane ne ala.
Mvuture kakyi ngondia
16Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Ka kyire Aarɔn kyɛ, ‘Tengyɛ wɔ pɔmaa ne, ná fa fĩ aseɛnwo mvuture nu ma ɔkakyi ngondia wɔ Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa.’ ” 17Bɛyɔle sɔ. Aarɔn tengyɛle ye sa nu fale pɔmaa ne fini aseɛnwo mvuture nu, na ngondia te guale mmenia ne ngaka so. Na aseɛnwo mvuture amukoraa bɔ ɔwɔ Misraim kakyili ngondia. 18Ngonyaayelɛfoɛ nemɔ bɔle mmɔden kyɛ bɛkɔma ngondia kɔwa ɔ, nakoso bangora. Yiti ngondia kekale mmenia ne ngaka. 19Na ngonyaayelɛfoɛ nemɔ sele Faro kyɛ, “Ɛhe de, Nyameɛ sa wɔ nu! Nakoso Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wandɛ bɛ so, kyɛbɔ AWURADE hane ne ala.
Nwɔsea pembepembe
20Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Dwɔso ngyerɛmɔ tutuutu kɔ Faro berɛ, wɔ mmerɛ bɔ ófite kɔ nzue ne anu ɔ, ná ka kyire ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE nwa nyoo: Ma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bɛhɔ, ná bɛɛso me. 21Na sɛ amma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bangɔ a, ngɔsoma nwɔsea pembepembe paa maa bɛkɔwa wɔ ne wɔ mbanyi ne wɔ mmenia so, ɔne w’awuro mɔ nu. Nwɔsea koyi Misraimfoɛ awuro mɔ nu tɛkyɛ, ɔne aseɛ bɔ bɛ gya gyi so ne po. 22Nakoso sɔ kyẽa ne, ngɔye Gosen aseɛ bɔ me mmenia te so ne ngosie ahameɛ; nwɔsea pembepembe paa ne ngɔhɔ berɛ bie, amaa ɔnate so anwu ye kyɛ me ole AWURADE wɔ aseɛ ye aso. 23Yiti ngɔfa elelɛ ɛwɛen ngɔto me mmenia ne wɔ mmenia afia; na sɔ nzɛngyerɛnneɛ ne kosi ɛhema.’ ” 24AWURADE yɔle sɔ koso amba. Nwɔsea pembepembe paa wale beeyili Faro awuro ne ye mbanyi mɔ awuro tɛkyɛ. Na nwɔsea lele Misraim aseɛ ne aso amukoraa fale.
25Afei Faro frɛle Mose ne Aarɔn, na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛmɔhɔ bɛɛbɔ afɔleɛ bɛma ɛmɔ Nyameɛ ne wɔ maen he anu ala.” 26Na Mose buale kyɛ, “Ɔtte mayee kyɛ yɛkɔyɔ sɔ ɔ; ofikyɛ afɔleɛ bɔ yɛkɔbɔ kɔma AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ nen, Misraimfoɛ bekyi. Na sɛ yɛfa nningyein bɔ Misraimfoɛ bekyi yɛbɔ afɔleɛ wɔ bɛ nyunu wa a, aso bɛngɔboro yɛ nyɔboɛ? 27Ɔsɛ kyɛ yɛpɛ atee bɔ bɛfa ɛlɛsa bɛpɛ ɔ wɔ ɛserɛ so yɛkɔbɔ afɔleɛ yɛma AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ne, kyɛbɔ wahyɛ yɛ ne ala.” 28Na Faro sele kyɛ, “Ngɔmaa ɛmɔkɔɔbɔ afɔleɛ bɛkɔma AWURADE ɛmɔ Nyameɛ ne wɔ ɛserɛ so, nakoso nnɛma ɛmɔkɔ dedeede. Ɛ́mɔli me ti dwirɛ bɛma me.” 29Na Mose buale kyɛ, “Mefi wɔ wa mekɔ ala a, ngɔsrɛ AWURADE. Na nwɔsea pembepembe paa ne kofi Faro ne ye mbanyi ne ye mmenia so kɔhɔ ɛhema. Nakoso nnɛma Faro yɛ nnakannaka ko kyɛ ɔngɔma mmenia ne ngɔɔbɔ afɔleɛ ngɔma AWURADE.” 30Yiti Mose fili Faro nwo berɛ hɔle ɔɔsrɛle AWURADE. 31AWURADE yɔle bɔ Mose srɛle ye ne. Ɔmane nwɔsea pembepembe paa ne fili Faro ne ye mbanyi ne ye mmenia so hɔle, bɔ ko po anga berɛ ɔ. 32Nakoso Faro sá bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so sɔ mmerɛ ne, na wamma mmenia ne ate ma bangɔ.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 9
Content:
Nyɛmmoa wuwuli
1Afei AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Kɔ Faro berɛ kose ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE, Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne nwa nyoo: Ma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bɛhɔ, ná bɛɛsɔne me. 2Ofikyɛ sɛ anyakyi bɛ ate ma bangɔ, ná ɛkye bɛ sie wa a, 3AWURADE tumi kɔma ngaka wue bɔ ye noa yɛ hye kɔha wɔ ngaka bɔ bahɔ adidie ɔ, wɔ mbɔngɔ mɔ, afunum mɔ, afupɔngɔ mɔ ne wɔ nyɛmmoa mɔ. 4Nakoso AWURADE kɔfa ɛwɛen kɔto Yisrael ngaka ne Misraim ngaka b’afia, amaa ɔnate so Yisraelfoɛ ngaka nemɔ nu biala anwu.’ ” 5Na AWURADE hyɛle kyẽa kyɛ, “Ɛhema yeɛ AWURADE kɔyɔ sɔ nikyee ne wɔ aseɛ ne aso ɔ.” 6Aleɛ hyene ne, AWURADE yɔle sɔ ala. Misraimfoɛ nyɛmmoa mukoraa wuwuli, nakoso Yisraelfoɛ nyɛmmoa de, ko po anwu. 7Faro somane mmenia maa bɛɛneane, na benwuni kyɛ Yisraelfoɛ ngaka nemɔ, nu ko po wanwu. Nakoso Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wamma mmenia ne ate ma bangɔ.
Mbɔmbɔ anwonyerɛ to pete
8AWURADE sele Mose ne Aarɔn kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔfura foonoo nu nzoen bɛ sa bum ngoko, ná ma Mose ɔ́to hɔ anwuro wɔ Faro nyunu. 9Ɔkɔkakyi mvuture muhumuhu kotu kɔfa Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa; na ɔkɔkakyi mbɔmbɔ kotutu mmenia ne ngaka nwo ngena wɔ Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa.” 10Yiti befurale foonoo nu nzoen, beegyinane Faro nyunu, Mose to hɔle anwuro, na ɔkakyili mbɔmbɔ tutuli mmenia ne ngaka nwo ngena. 11Ɔnate mbɔmbɔ ne ati, ngonyaayelɛfoɛ nemɔ angora Mose nyunu gyina, ofikyɛ né mbɔmbɔ abobɔ ngonyaayelɛfoɛ nemɔ ne Misraimfoɛ amukoraa. 12Nakoso AWURADE mane Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wandɛ bɛ so, kyɛbɔ AWURADE ha hyirele Mose ne ala.
Asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ
13Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Pɛ aleɛ dwɔso ná kɔ Faro berɛ kose ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE, Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne nwa nyoo: Ma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bɛhɔ, na bɛɛsɔne me. 14Ofikyɛ afei de, mebaama me hawo amukoraa ba wɔ bɔbɔ wɔ so, wɔ somvoɛ mɔ ne wɔ maen so, amaa ɔnate so anwu ye kyɛ ebiala nne berɛ bɔ ɔte kyɛ me ɔ wɔ aseɛ so amukoraa. 15Na sɛ matengyɛ me sa mama ewue anwonyerɛ abɔ wɔ ne wɔ mmenia a, ahaa bekye awu afi aseɛ ye aso. 16 Nakoso mamaa anya wɔ ti adidi nu, kyɛ ngɔye me tumi ali ngohyire wɔ ɔ, amaa ɔnate so me dumaa atrɛ ahɔ aseɛ ye aso amukoraa. 17Nakoso bekye po yeɛ adwɔso atia me mmenia, bɔ ɛngɔma bɛngɔhɔ ɔ. 18Tie, ɛhema bekye sɔa ala, ngɔma asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ kɔtete kogua, bɔ ye sɛso ɔwwale Misraim le fite mmerɛ bɔ bɛkyekyele maen ne bɔ ɔbaadwu ɛnɛ ɔ. 19Yiti ma wɔ nyɛmmoa ne wɔ nikyee biala bɔ ɔwɔ buro bɛbra awuro bɛɛbɔ bɛ nwo waen, ofikyɛ asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne kɔtɔ kogua sona ne kaka bɔ ɔwɔ buro, bɔ wamma awuro so, na bekowuwu.’ ” 20Na Faro mbanyi nemɔ nu biala bɔ osuro AWURADE dwirɛ nen, ɔmane ye ngoaa ne ye nyɛmmoa nwatili wale awuro. 21Nakoso bɛ nu biemɔ bɔ bemmu AWURADE dwirɛ ne de, bɛyakyili bɛ ngoaa ne bɛ nyɛmmoa mɔ wɔ eburo.
22Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Tengyɛ wɔ sa fa kyire anwuro ma asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ tɔ gua Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa, ma ogua sona ne ngaka ne eburo mmakaa mukoraa so wɔ Misraim aseɛ so.” 23Yiti Mose pagyale ye pɔmaa ne hyirele anwuro, AWURADE mane anwuro bɔle nu kurudududu, ɔtɔle asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ guale, na agralaa tetele fili anwuro wale ase. Na AWURADE tɔle asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ guale Misraim aseɛ so 24Asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne agralaa bɔ ɔ́tete see yerɛmyerɛm lili afra. Na kyɛbɔ ye suronyi si te ne, ofite kyɛ Misraim yɛle maen ɔ, ye sɛso ɔwwale Misraim aseɛ ne amukoraa so le. 25Asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne sɛkyele nikyee biala bɔ ɔwɔ buro wɔ Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa, fite mmenia so kodwu ngaka so; ɔsɛkyele eburo nningyein amukoraati, na ɔpombale eburo mmakaa mukoraati. 26Sana Gosen aseɛ so, nekaa bɔ né Yisraelfoɛ te ne, yeɛ asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne bie andɔ berɛ ɔ.
27Afei Faro somane maa bɛɛfrɛle Mose ne Aarɔn bɛwale, na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛhe de, mayɛ bɔne, AWURADE di be, na me ne me mmenia mukoraa yɛdi fɔ. 28Yiti ɛ́mɔsrɛ AWURADE bɛma ɔyakyi, ofikyɛ agralaa ne asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ sɔa de, ɔbo yɛ so. Ngɔma ɛmɔ kɔhɔ, na ɛmɔngɔtena wa ko.” 29Na Mose sele ye kyɛ, “Sɛ mefi kuro ye anu mefite pɛ a, ngɔtrɛ me sa nu ngɔsrɛ AWURADE, na agralaa ne kɔyakyi, yeɛ asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne koso ngɔte ngogua ko, amaa ɔnate so anwu ye kyɛ aseɛ ye te AWURADE deɛ. 30Nakoso ɛne wɔ mbanyi mɔ de, mese kyɛ ɛmɔnnya bessurole AWURADE Nyameɛ.” 31(Gyese ne ayuo sɛkyele, ofikyɛ né ayuo afa mmaa, yeɛ né gyese koso abɔ nyerɛen. 32Nakoso ɛmo ahoroɔ mɔ bɔ bannua bɛ ndɛ ne de, banzɛkye.) 33Mose fili Faro awuro berɛ, ofili kuro ne anu, ɔtrɛle ye sa nu srɛle AWURADE, na agralaa ne asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne yakyili, na esue ne andɔ angua aseɛ ne aso ko. 34Nakoso Faro nwuni kyɛ esue ne asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne agralaa ne ayakyi nen, ɔhɔle so yɔle bɔne, na ɔne ye mbanyi mɔ bebubuli mmakaa betuatuale bɛ so. 35Yiti Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wamma Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ ate maa bangɔ, kyɛbɔ AWURADE nate Mose so hane ne ala.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 10
Content:
Mmɛbɛ
1Afei AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Kɔ Faro berɛ, ofikyɛ me yeɛ mamaa ɔne ye mbanyi mɔ babubu mmakaa batuatua bɛ so ɔ, amaa ɔnate so mala me nzɛngyerɛnneɛ hemɔ ali wɔ bɛ berɛ. 2Na ɔnate so ɛkɔha kyɛbɔ masi magoro Misraimfoɛ nwo, ɔne nzɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ mayɔ ye bɛ berɛ kohyire ɛwa ne w’anomaa. Na ɛhe kɔmaa ekonwu ye kyɛ me ole AWURADE.”
3Yiti Mose ne Aarɔn bɛhɔle Faro berɛ beesele ye kyɛ, “AWURADE, Hebrifoɛ Nyameɛ ne nwa nyoo, ‘Ɛkɔpo kyɛ ɛkɔbrɛ wɔ nwo ase wɔ me nyunu maa okoodwu kyinzu? Ma me mmenia nemɔ ate ma bɛhɔ, ná bɛɛsɔne me. 4Na sɛ ampene amma me mmenia nemɔ angɔ a, ɛhema ngɔma mmɛbɛ kɔwa wɔ maen ye anu, 5na bekoyi bɛkɔfa aseɛ ne, bɔ sona biala ngonwu aseɛ ne ɔ. Na nikyee biala bɔ ɔhale berɛ mane ɛmɔ, bɔ asukɔtwea nyɔboɛ ne anzɛkye ye ne, bekoli; yeɛ ɛmɔ mmakaa mukoraa bɔ begyigyi buro koso, bekoli. 6Bekoyi w’awuro mɔ nu tɛkyɛ, wɔ mbanyi mɔ awuro amukoraa, ɔne Misraimfoɛ awuro amukoraa nu tɛkyɛ; bɔ wɔ baba mɔ ne wɔ nana mɔ bennwuni bie le, fite kyɛ bɛwale aseɛ ye aso bɔ ɔbaadwu ɛnɛ ɔ.’ ” Afei ɔkakyili ye nwo yakyili Faro berɛ hɔle.
7Na Faro mbanyi mɔ sele ye kyɛ, “Kyinzu koraa yeɛ biaa he kosua yɛ ngaen maa ɔkɔɔpem ɔ? Ma mmienzua ne bɛhɔ bɛɛsɔne AWURADE bɛ Nyameɛ ne. Aso ennwu ye kyɛ Misraim abɔ ɔ?” 8Yiti bɛmane Mose ne Aarɔn sá wale Faro berɛ, na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛmɔhɔ bɛɛsɔne AWURADE ɛmɔ Nyameɛ ne. Nakoso ɛmɔ nu nwa mɔ yeɛ bɛkɔhɔ ɔ?” 9Na Mose sele kyɛ, “Yɛ ne yɛ ngwadaa ne yɛ mbanyi, yɛ mma mmienzua ne mmrasua, yɛ mmoaen ne yɛ nandwie mɔ yeɛ yɛkɔhɔ ɔ, ofikyɛ, ɔsɛ kyɛ yɛdi aluolue yɛhyɛ AWURADE animnyam.” 10Na Faro sele bɛ kyɛ, “AWURADE óli ɛmɔ si, sɛ ɔba ye kyɛ mema ate maa ɛmɔ ne ɛmɔ mma mɔ bɛkɔ a! Yeɛ ɛmɔanwu ye kyɛ ɛmɔle adwene tɛɛ ɔ! 11Ɔngɔyɛ yee! Ɛ́mɔma mmienzua nemɔ angome bɛhɔ bɛɛsɔne AWURADE, ofikyɛ bɔ ɛmɔpena hɔ ɛne.” Yiti bɛfoane Mose ne Aarɔn befili Faro nyunu.
12Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Ma wɔ sa so kyire Misraim aseɛ ne ma mmɛbɛ beyi bɛfa aseɛ ne, ná beli aseɛ ne aso nyaanyaa mukoraa bɔ asukɔtwea akungumaboɔ ne anzɛkye ye ne.” 13Yiti Mose mane ye pɔmaa ne aso hyirele Misraim aseɛ ne. Na AWURADE mane eyia afiteleɛ mvrama tuli aseɛ ne aso sɔ kyẽa ne eyia ne kɔngɔen amukoraa. Na aleɛ hyene ngyerɛmɔ nen, né eyia afiteleɛ mvrama ne afa mmɛbɛ nemɔ wawa. 14Mmɛbɛ nemɔ wale Misraim aseɛ so amu, na beyi bɛfale Misraim maen ne amu. Na kyɛbɔ besi bɛyɛle manyamanya nen, ebie ɔwwale le, yeɛ ebie koso ngɔwa le. 15Beyili bɛfale aseɛ ne aso amukoraa mane aseɛ ne aso yɛle tunn. Na aseɛ ne aso nyaa mukoraa ne mmakaammaa mukoraa bɔ asukɔtwea akungumaboɔ ne anzɛkye bɛ ne, belili. Nikyee monɛ ko po anga wɔ eburo mmakaa ne ndire mɔ so, wɔ Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa.
16Afei Faro hane ye nwo tole ye sa frɛle Mose ne Aarɔn maa bɛwale, na osele kyɛ, “Mayɛ bɔne matia AWURADE ɛmɔ Nyameɛ ne, ɔne ɛmɔ. 17Yiti mesrɛ wɔ, ɛhe angome de, fa me bɔne kyɛ me; na ɛ́mɔsrɛ AWURADE ɛmɔ Nyameɛ ne ma ɔye ewue he fi me so.” 18Yiti Mose fili Faro nwo berɛ hɔle ɔɔsrɛle AWURADE. 19Na AWURADE mane eyia atɔleɛ mvrama piri bie tuli, na opiane mmɛbɛ nemɔ ooguale Ɛpo Kɔkorɛ nu. Abɛbɛ ko po anga berɛ wɔ Misraim aseɛ so nekaa biala. 20Nakoso AWURADE mane Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wamma Yisraelfoɛ ate ma bangɔ.
21Afei AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Tengyɛ wɔ sa fa kyire anwuro ma awosii bra Misraim aseɛ so, awosii bɔ sana bɛfa bɛ sa befuafua ɔ.” 22Yiti Mose tengyɛle ye sa hyirele anwuro, na awosii kabii wale Misraim aseɛ so amukoraa ɛlɛsa. 23Ɛlɛsa mumua, ebiala annwu obiɛngo, anaakyɛ wandu ye gya; nakoso nekaa bɔ né Yisraelfoɛ bɛte ne de, ewienu yɛle hyireinn. 24Afei Faro frɛle Mose, na osele ye kyɛ, “Ɛmɔhɔ bɛɛsɔne AWURADE ɛmɔ ne ɛmɔ mma mɔ bɛhɔ; nakoso ɛmɔ mmoaen ne nandwie mɔ de, odi kyɛ bɛka wa.” 25Nakoso Mose sele kyɛ, “Odi kyɛ ɛma yɛ sa ka nningyein bɔ yɛkɔfa kɔbɔ afɔleɛ ɔne naen yeralɛ afɔleɛ yɛkɔma AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ne ɔ. 26Odi kyɛ yɛfa yɛ nyɛmmoa koso yɛkɔ; bɛ gya mbaboa ko po ngɔha wa, ofikyɛ bɛ nu bie yeɛ yɛkwaafa yɛsɔne AWURADE yɛ Nyameɛ ɔ. Na yɛngɔhora ngonwu nikyee bɔ yɛkɔfa yɛkɔsɔne AWURADE ɔ, sana yadwu dɔ koraka.” 27Nakoso AWURADE mane Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wamma bɛ ate maa bangɔ. 28Na Faro sele Mose kyɛ, “Fi me nyunu wa kɔ! Nea wɔ nwo yé, na nnɛmaa menwu wɔ nyunu ko; ofikyɛ kyẽa bɔ ɛkɔwa me nyunu ne, ngɔmaa bekohu wɔ.” 29Na Mose buale kyɛ, “Yoo, ɛnwa nnɛmaa meba wɔ nyunu ko a, mate!”

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 11
Content:
Amaneɛ piri bɔ ɔpɛ ye bo ɔ
1AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Waha amaneɛ pirikua ko bɔ mebaafa meto Faro ne Misraim so ɔ. Ɛhe asi ye, ɔkɔmaa ɛmɔkofi wa bɛkɔhɔ, na sɛ ɔma ɛmɔ ate a, ɔkɔfoa ɛmɔ maa ɛmɔkofi wa. 2Afei, bɔ wɔ mmenia nemɔ amaneɛ kyɛ, ɔsɛ kyɛ bienzua biala ne brasua biala obisa ɛdwetɛ ne sikaa kɔkorɛ mbembenanneɛ ofi obiɛngo Misraimniɛ berɛ.” 3AWURADE mane Misraimfoɛ lole Yisraelfoɛ. Asa koso, né Mose te sona bɔ odi mu wɔ Misraim aseɛ so, wɔ Faro mbanyi mɔ ne maen ne nyunu.
4Na Mose hane kyɛ, “AWURADE nwa nyoo: Ngɔɔnatenate Misraim kɔyɛ abunnamu; 5na bamuɛbaa bienzua biala bɔ ɔwɔ Misraim aseɛ so kowu, fite Faro bamuɛbaa bienzua bɔ ɔtena ye bia so ɔ so, kodwu afaneɛ bɔ osi aburoo ɔ ɔwa so, ɔne nyɛmmoa mɔ bɛ bamuɛbaa mɔ so. 6Na awuye piri paa bɔ bɛkɔbɔ ye wɔ Misraim aseɛ mukoraa so ne, ebie ossili le, yeɛ ebie koso ngosi ko. 7Nakoso Yisraelfoɛ mɔ de, kyea po ongopo sona anaa kaka biala; amaa ɔnate so ɛmɔanwu ye kyɛ AWURADE ma nzonzoleɛ da Misraim ne Yisrael nu. 8Na wɔ mbanyi hemɔ amukoraa bɛkɔwa me nyunu bekoobu ndwerɛ bɛkɔhã kyɛ, ‘Fi wa kɔ, ɛne wɔ mmenia bɔ beli wɔ si amukoraa!’ Na ɛhe asi ne, ngofi wa ngɔhɔ.” Afei Mose fɛle ɛyaa hahii fili Faro nyunu berɛ hɔle. 9Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Faro ngɔtɛ ɛmɔ so, na ɔnate so m’anwanwadeɛ kɔsone pee wɔ Misraim aseɛ so.”
10Mose ne Aarɔn yɔle anwanwadeɛ he amukoraa wɔ Faro nyunu; AWURADE mane Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, na wamma Yisraelfoɛ ate ma bamvi ye aseɛ so bangɔ.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 12
Content:
Abɔtra aluolue ne
1AWURADE sele Mose ne Aarɔn wɔ Misraim aseɛ so kyɛ, 2“Bosome he yeɛ ɔkɔyɛ ɛmɔ bosome bɔ oli moa ɔ; ɔkɔyɛ afoɛ ne anu bosome bɔ oli moa kɔma ɛmɔ. 3Ka kyire Yisrael maen ne amukoraa kyɛ, bosome he anu kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so buru ne, ɔsɛ kyɛ bienzua biala pena boaen akrɔngrɔma ko ma ye awuro ama, awuro biala nu kohia boaen akrɔngrɔma ko. 4Na sɛ boaen akrɔngrɔma ne bo awuro ne anu mmenia so a, ye de ma sɔ awuro ne ɔne awuro foforɛ bɔ opingye ye ne bɛhyɛ naen ne, kyɛbɔ nu mmenia somaa si te ɔ. Na kyɛbɔ sona biala kɔhora ye di ne, sɔ yeɛ ɛ́mɔnea so bɛ́fa mmoaen akrɔngrɔma ne ɔ. 5Ɔsɛ kyɛ boaen akrɔngrɔma ne yɛ nyii bɔ wali afoɛ ko, bɔ ollili nnɛen ɔ. Ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔsa nu bɛye bɛ befi mmoaen anaa mbɔngye nemɔ anu. 6Ɛ́mɔfa ye bésie toonn ma odwu bosome he anu kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so buru ne nna ne, na afei Yisrael maen ne amukoraa behũhũ bɛ mmoaen ne nɔsoa. 7Awuro bɔ bekoli naen ne wɔ nu nen, ɔsɛ kyɛ bɛfa mogya ne bie bɛkeka aponnwaa nyɔ ne, ɔne sua ne ye bati so. 8Ɔsɛ kyɛ bɛtoto naen ne bedi ye sɔ kɔngɔen ne, ná bɛfa paanoo kabrɛdi ne awɔwee nyaa bɛboka so. 9Nnɛma ɛmɔdi ye monɛ, yeɛ nnɛma ɛmɔfa nzue bɛto, na mmom ɛ́mɔtoto: ye ti, ye gya ne ye kunu nningyein ne boka so. 10Nnɛma ɛmɔfa ebie besie ma aleɛ kye so; na sɛ ebie ka ma aleɛ kye so a, odi kyɛ ɛmɔyera ye. 11Atee he aso yeɛ ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔpe so bedi ɔ: ɛ́mɔbɔ ɛmɔ abɔsoɛ, ɛ́mɔwura ɛmɔ mbaboa, ɛ́mɔfa ɛmɔ pɔmaa nemɔ bétiratira, ná ɛ́mɔli ye ndɛndɛ. AWURADE Abɔtra ne ɛne. 12Ngɔɔpɛ nu Misraim aseɛ so sɔ kyẽa ne kɔngɔen, na ngohũ Misraim aseɛ so bamuɛbaa mukoraa, fite mmenia so kodwu ngaka so; na ngobua Misraim mmosoen amukoraa ndɛen. Me ole AWURADE. 13 Mogya ne yeɛ ɔkɔhyɛ ɛmɔ nzorɛ, wɔ awuro mɔ bɔ ɛmɔtete nu ne anu ɔ. Na sɛ menwu mogya ne a, ngɔbɔ ngɔtra ɛmɔ, amaa sɛ mébɔ Misraim maen ne a, amaneɛ ne bie ando ɛmɔ. 14Kyẽa sɔ ne kɔyɛ ngayeɛ kyẽa kɔma ɛmɔ, na ɛ́mɔli ye aluolue bɛma AWURADE; na odi kyɛ ɛmɔdi sɔ aluolue ne afebɔɔ wɔ ɛmɔ aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ mukoraa nu.
Paanoo Kabrɛdi aluolue
15“Ɛmɔkoli paanoo kabrɛdi ɛlɛsoo. Kyẽa bɔ oli moa ne, ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔye mɔle harewaa biala befi ɛmɔ awuro mɔ nu, ofikyɛ ofi kyẽa bɔ oli moa ne alaa bɔ ɔkwaadwu kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so nzoo nen, sona biala bɔ okoli mɔle harewaa ne, bɛkɔpɛ ye asue bekofi Yisraelfoɛ nu. 16Ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔyɛ nyianu krongron wɔ kyẽa bɔ oli moa ne, yeɛ kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so nzoo ne koso ɛ́mɔyɛ nyianu krongron. Nnɛma ɛmɔyɔ adwuma wɔ sɔ ngyẽa ne; sana aleɛ bɔ ebiala koli angome yeɛ ɛ́mɔyɔ ye nwo adwuma ɔ. 17Ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔdi Paanoo Kabrɛdi aluolue ne, ofikyɛ sɔ kyẽa ne yeɛ nyele ɛmɔ amukoraati mvili Misraim aseɛ so ɔ. Yiti ɛ́mɔtu sɔ kyẽa ne besie berɛ beli sɔ aluolue ne afebɔɔ wɔ ɛmɔ aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ mukoraa nu. 18Bosome bɔ oli moa ne anu, kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so buru ne nna ne ye nɔsoa, bɔ ɔkwaadwu kyẽa bɔ ɔtɔ so aburanyɔ ne ko ne ye nɔsoa, ɛ́mɔli paanoo kabrɛdi. 19Ɛlɛsoo ne anu, ɔnzɛ kyɛ benwu mɔle harewaa wɔ ɛmɔ awuro; ofikyɛ ebiala bɔ okoli mɔle harewaa nen, sɛ ɛwɔfoɛ ahɔ oo, anaa bɛwole ye maen ne anu oo, bɛkɔpɛ sɔ sona ne asue bekofi Yisraelfoɛ nu. 20Nnɛma ɛmɔdi nikyee harewaa biala. Ɛ́mɔli paanoo kabrɛdi wɔ nekaa biala bɔ ɛmɔkɔtena ɔ.”
Abɔtra Aluolue bɔ oli moa
21Afei Mose frɛle Yisrael mbanyi amukoraa, na osele bɛ kyɛ, “Ebiala ɔɔhye boaen ko ma ye awuro ama, ná ohu ye fa yɛ Abɔtra boaen ne. 22Ɛ́mɔfa sufiɛ, ná ɛ́mɔfa bɛbɔ mogya bɔ ɔwɔ ayaa ne anu, ná ɛ́mɔfa mogya bɔ ɔwɔ nu ne bɛ́keka sua ne bati so ɔne aponnwaa nyɔ ne. Nnɛma ɛmɔ nu biala fi ye awuro fite maa okodwu ngyerɛmɔ. 23Ofikyɛ AWURADE kɔɔpɛ nu kohũhũ Misraimfoɛ; na sɛ AWURADE nwu mogya bɔ ɔwɔ sua ne ye bati so, ɔne aponnwaa nyɔ nemɔ nwo a, okosã sɔ anoa ne anwo, na ɔngɔma sɛkyelɛniɛ ne ate ma ɔngɔwa ɛmɔ awuro berɛ ongohũhũ ɛmɔ. 24Odi kyɛ ɛmɔdi sɔ dwirɛ he aso; ɔte nhyehyɛleɛ ma wɔ ne wɔ boso ama afebɔɔ. 25Na sɛ ɛmɔdwu aseɛ bɔ AWURADE baafa ma ɛmɔ ne aso, kyɛbɔ wahyɛ ye nwo bɔ ne a, ɛmɔhɔ so beli sɔ aluolue he. 26Na sɛ ɛmɔ mma mɔ bisa ɛmɔ kyɛ, ‘Ɛmɔ aluolue he, ye bo ole sɛɛ?’ a 27Ɛmɔhã kyɛ, ‘Ɔte Abɔtra afɔleɛ bɔ yɛbɔ yɛma AWURADE bɔ ohuhuni Misraimfoɛ ne. Nakoso odwuli Yisraelfoɛ awuro mɔ nwo wɔ Misraim nen, ɔpɛle nu hɔle maa yɛnyane yɛ ti yɛdidili nu.’ ” Na mmenia ne bɔle bɛ ti ase bɛsɔne (Nyameɛ). 28Na Yisraelfoɛ mɔ hɔle bɛɛyɔle sɔ, kyɛbɔ AWURADE hyɛle Mose ne Aarɔn ne ala.
Misraim bamuɛbaa mmienzua wuwu
29Ye abunnamu ne, AWURADE huhuni Misraim aseɛ so bamuɛbaa mmienzua mukoraati, fite Faro bamuɛbaa bienzua bɔ ɔtena ye bia so ɔ so, kodwu sona bɔ bahye ye nnure bawura kuku nu ye bamuɛbaa so, ɔne nyɛmmoa mɔ bɛ bamuɛbaa mɔ so. 30Yeɛ Faro dwɔsole kɔngɔen ne, ɔne ye mbanyi mɔ amukoraa ne Misraimfoɛ amukoraa, na awuyebɔlɛ piri paa wale Misraim, ofikyɛ awuro biala nne berɛ bɔ sona anwu nu ɔ. 31Na Faro tole ye sa frɛle Mose ne Aarɔn kɔngɔen ne sele bɛ kyɛ, “Ɛmɔ ne Yisraelfoɛ, ɛmɔhã bɛ nwo befi me maen ye anu bɛhɔ! Ɛmɔhɔ bɛɛsɔne AWURADE, kyɛbɔ ɛmɔaha ne. 32Ɛ́mɔfa ɛmɔ mmoaen ne ɛmɔ nandwie mɔ, ná ɛ́mɔfi wa bɛhɔ, kyɛbɔ ɛmɔhane nen, ná ɛ́mɔyira me koso.
33Misraimfoɛ hane Yisraelfoɛ bo kyɛ bɛha bɛ nwo befi aseɛ ne aso; ofikyɛ bɛhane kyɛ, “Yɛ mukoraa yawu yayie.” 34Yiti Yisraelfoɛ tetele bɛ mɔle wɔ mmerɛ bɔ né ɔngeka ɔ. Bɛfale bɛ ndena bɛkyekyele ye nwo wɔ ngukue nu, na bɛfa bɛtole bɛ kɔme anwo. 35Yisraelfoɛ yɔle kyɛbɔ Mose ha hyirele bɛ ne, ofikyɛ né badide ɛdwetɛ ne sikaa kɔkorɛ mbembenanneɛ ne ɛtena bafi Misraimfoɛ berɛ. 36Né AWURADE ama Misraimfoɛ alo Yisraelfoɛ dada; yiti bɛ sa hane bɔ bebisale befili bɛ berɛ amukoraati. Bɛyɛle Misraimfoɛ dosodoso.
Yisraelfoɛ tu fi Misraim
37Yisraelfoɛ tu fili Ramese bɛhɔle Sukote. Mmienzua kɔyɛ apee ɛyaa nzia yeɛ bɛfale ase bɛhɔle ɔ; banga mmrasua ne ngwadaa bammoka so. 38Mmenia mvrafra pee koso ne bɛ hɔle, na nyɛmmoa pee paa boka so: mmoaen ne nandwie. 39Na mɔle kabrɛdi bɔ bɛ ne ye fili Misraim wale ne, bɛfa bɛyɔle taterɛ. Nna mɔle harewaa ɔ. Na ɔnate kyɛ betuli bɛ apereapereɛ so befili Misraim ne ati, bannya atee banyɔ aleɛ bɔ bekoli ye atunu ɔ.
40 Yisraelfoɛ afoɛ bɔ belili wɔ Misraim te ɛyaa nna ne aburasa. 41Na kyẽa bɔ afoɛ ɛyaa nna ne aburasa ne sone ne, AWURADE mmenia ne amukoraa tu fili Misraim aseɛ so. 42Sɔ kɔngɔen ne, AWURADE lili Yisraelfoɛ nwo afofi, kyɛbɔ ɔkɔyɛ bɔ ɔkɔye bɛ kofi Misraim aseɛ so ɔ. Yiti odwu sɔ kyẽa ne kɔngɔen a, Yisraelfoɛ aworɛ ndoatoasoɛ amukoraa besili pɛ bɛfa bɛye AWURADE ayɛ.
Abɔtra ne nwo nhyehyɛleɛ
43Na AWURADE sele Mose ne Aarɔn kyɛ, “Abɔtra ne nwo nhyehyɛleɛ ɛhe: amanvraniɛ biala nni ye aleɛ ne bie. 44Nakoso kanganiɛ biala bɔ afa sikaa atɔ ye ne, ɛpɛ ye bienzua de a, ɔkora di bie. 45Ɛwɔfoɛ bɔ ɔne ɛmɔ baatena anaa paaniɛ biala nni bie. 46 Awuro ko anu ala yeɛ odi kyɛ ɛmɔtena bedi ɔ; nnɛma ɛmɔfa naen ne bie befite aluo, yeɛ nnɛma ɛmɔbɔ ye bowue nu. 47Ɔsɛ kyɛ Yisraelfoɛ mukoraati bedi sɔ aluolue ne. 48Na sɛ ɛwɔfoɛ bie ɔne wɔ yeɛ bɛte ɔ, ná okuro kyɛ odi Abɔtra aluolue ne ɔye AWURADE ayɛ a, ye de maa bɛpɛ ye nwo ama mmienzua mukoraa bɛ bienzua, amaa wanya ye nwo ate wali bie. Ɛhe kɔmaa ɔkɔyɛ kyɛ maen ne anu niɛ; nakoso bɔ bɛppɛle ye bienzua ne de, ɔnzɛ kyɛ odi bie. 49 Mmeraa komapɛ bɔ ɔwɔ berɛ ma maen mmaa ne, ye ala yeɛ ɔwɔ berɛ ma ɛwɔfoɛ bɔ ɔne ɛmɔ baatena ɔ.”
50Yiti Yisraelfoɛ amukoraa yɔle kyɛbɔ AWURADE hyɛle Mose ne Aarɔn ne ala. 51Na AWURADE yele Yisraelfoɛ ɛlɔen kure kure ne fili Misraim aseɛ so sɔ kyẽa ne.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 13
Content:
Bɛfa bamuɛbaa bienzua bɛma Nyameɛ
1AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, 2 “Tu bamuɛbaa mukoraa sie berɛ ma me; ebiala bɔ okoli moa kofi koɛsɛen nu kɔwa wɔ Yisraelfoɛ nu ne, sona oo, ayɛmmoa oo, ɔte me deɛ.”
Paanoo Kabrɛdi aluolue
3Na Mose sele mmenia ne kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔkaye sɔ kyẽa he bɔ ɛmɔfili Misraim ɔ, bɔ ɛmɔfili ngoaasolɛ nu ne, ofikyɛ AWURADE nate tumi piri so yeɛ ɔyele ɛmɔ fili Misraim ɔ; yiti nnɛma ɛmɔdi paanoo harewaa biala. 4Ɛnɛ kyẽa ye, wɔ bosome Abibo nu, yeɛ ɛ́mɔfi Misraim ɔ. 5Na sɛ AWURADE fa wɔ kodwu Kanaanfoɛ, Hitifoɛ, Amorifoɛ, Hiwifoɛ ne Yebusifoɛ aseɛ bɔ ɔtale ndaen hyirele wɔ nana mɔ kyɛ ɔkɔfa kɔma wɔ ne aso, aseɛ bɔ nyɔfonesue ne woɛ tengyɛ wɔ so ne aso a, di aluolue he wɔ ɛsraen he anu. 6Di paanoo kabrɛdi ɛlɛsoo, ná di aluolue ne fa ye AWURADE ayɛ wɔ ye ɛlɛsoo ne aso. 7Ɛlɛsoo yeɛ ɛ́mɔli paanoo kabrɛdi ɔ; ɔnzɛ kyɛ benwu paanoo harewaa biala wɔ ɛmɔ berɛ, anaa mɔle harewaa wɔ ɛmɔ aseɛ so nekaa biala. 8Na sɔ kyẽa ne, kyire nu kyire ɛwa kyɛ, ‘Ɔnate nikyee bɔ AWURADE yɔ mane me wɔ mmerɛ bɔ mvili Misraim ne ati ɔ.’ 9Na ɛhe kɔyɛ kyɛ sɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ ɔwɔ wɔ sa nwo, ná wayɛ ngayeɛ wɔ wɔ nwoma so wama wɔ, amaa ɔnate so AWURADE mmeraa ne ala wɔ noa; ofikyɛ AWURADE nate tumi piri so yeɛ ɔyele wɔ fili Misraim ɔ. 10Yiti di sɔ nhyehyɛleɛ he aso wɔ ye mmerɛ so afoɛnoa biala.
Bamuɛbaa bienzua
11Na sɛ AWURADE fa wɔ kodwu Kanaanfoɛ aseɛ so, ná ɔfa ma wɔ, kyɛbɔ ɔtale ndaen hyirele wɔ ne wɔ nana mɔ ne a, 12tu abɔdeɛ biala bɔ okoli moa kofi koɛsɛen nu kɔwa ne sie berɛ ma AWURADE. Wɔ nyɛmmoa mɔ bɛ bamuɛbaa bienzua mukoraa te AWURADE deɛ. 13Fa boaen ba sesã afunum bamuɛbaa biala, nakoso sɛ anzesã ye de a, ye de bu afunum ne kɔme anu. Yeɛ wɔ mma mɔ bɛ nu bamuɛbaa bienzua biala koso, odi kyɛ ɛpɔ ye fi AWURADE berɛ. 14Na sɛ kyẽa bie ɛwa bisa wɔ kyɛ, “Ɛhe bo kyire sɛɛ’ a, wɔ koso abua ye kyɛ, ‘AWURADE nate ye tumi piri so yeɛ ɔyele yɛ fili Misraim ngoaasolɛ nu ɔ. 15Ofikyɛ mmerɛ bɔ Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so kyɛ ɔngɔma yɛngɔhɔ nen, AWURADE huhuni Misraim aseɛ so bamuɛbaa mukoraati, fite mmenia bamuɛbaa mɔ so, maa oodwuli nyɛmmoa bamuɛbaa mɔ so. Na ɔnate sɔ ati yeɛ mefa kaka bamuɛbaa bienzua biala mebɔ afɔleɛ mema AWURADE ɔ. Nakoso me mma mɔ bɛ nu bamuɛbaa bienzua biala de, mepɔ ye (mefi AWURADE berɛ).’ 16Na ɛhe kɔyɛ kyɛ sɛngyerɛnneɛ bɔ ɔwɔ wɔ sa nwo, anaa ngayeɛ wɔ wɔ nwoma so, ofikyɛ AWURADE nate tumi piri so yeɛ ɔyele yɛ fili Misraim ɔ.”
Munungum ningɔnn ne see ningɔnn
17Faro mane mmenia ne ate kyɛ bɛhɔ nen, Nyameɛ amva bɛ amva Filistifoɛ aseɛ so, ɔwɔ nu kyɛ né berɛ yeɛ ɔte tika ɔ. Ofikyɛ Nyameɛ hane kyɛ, “Sɛ mmenia ne kɔtɔ koɛ nu a, annea a né banu bɛ nwo, ná basa bahɔ Misraim.” 18Yiti ɛserɛ so atee bɔ ɔkɔ Ɛpo Kɔkorɛ nwo ne, Nyameɛ mane mmenia ne makye fale so. Na Yisraelfoɛ tu fili Misraim aseɛ so bɛhɔle kyɛ mmenia bɔ bɛ́kɔ koɛ ɔ. 19 Mose sesale Yosef mmowue ne hɔle; ofikyɛ né Yosef ama Yisrael mma nemɔ ata ndaen. Osele kyɛ, “Nyameɛ koogyina ɛmɔ si, na ɔyɛ a, ɛ́mɔfa me mmowue ne béfi wa bɛhɔ.” 20Betuli bɛ bo befili Sukote, na beesikyele Etam, wɔ ɛserɛ ne noa. 21Alehyeleɛ nu, AWURADE lili bɛ nyunu wɔ munungum ningɔnn nu hyirele bɛ atee. Na alesaleɛ nu koso, ɔtale hyireinn mane bɛ wɔ see ningɔnn nu, kyɛbɔ bɛkɔhora bɛkɔnate eyia ne kɔngɔen ɔ. 22Munungum ningɔnn bɔ né oli bɛ nyunu ne, wanyakyi bɛ nu eyia; yeɛ see ningɔnn ne koso wanyakyi bɛ nu kɔngɔen.

Title: ƐKSADƆSO 14
Content:
Bɛpɛ Ɛpo Kɔkorɛ ne
1Afei AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, 2“Ka kyire Yisraelfoɛ kyɛ besa bɛ si beesi asikyeleɛ wɔ Pi Hahirote nyunu, wɔ Migidol ne ɛpo ne b’afia, wɔ Baal Sefon nyunu. Ye ndendeneɛ so yeɛ ɔsɛ kyɛ ɛmɔsi asikyeleɛ ne ɔ, wɔ ɛpo ne anoa. 3Ofikyɛ Faro kɔha kɔfa Yisraelfoɛ nwo kyɛ, ‘Baaha aseɛ ne aso, na ɛserɛ ne amaa basota berɛ.’ 4Ngɔma Faro kobubu mmakaa kotua ye so. Ɔkɔpo bɛ so, nakoso ɔnate Faro ne ye lɔen amukoraa so ngɔhyɛ me nwo animnyam; na Misraimfoɛ konwu ye kyɛ me ole AWURADE.” Na sɔ ala yeɛ Yisraelfoɛ yɔle ɔ.
5Mmerɛ bɔ bɛha behyirele Misraim hene kyɛ mmenia nemɔ anwati nen, ɔne ye mbanyi mɔ benyane adwene foforɛ wɔ mmenia nemɔ anwo, na besele kyɛ, “Nzikyɛ nikye yeɛ yayɔ ye, bɔ yama Yisraelfoɛ ayakyi yɛ solɛ ná bahɔ ye?” 6Yiti osiesiele ye teaseɛnam, na ɔfale ye asraafoɛ bokale ye nwo so. 7Ɔfale teaseɛnam paa paa ɛyaa nzia, ɔne Misraim teaseɛnam amukoraati, bɔ né safohene mɔ tete ye mukoraa nu ɔ. 8 Na AWURADE mane Misraim hene Faro bubuli mmakaa tuale ye so, yiti ɔpole Yisraelfoɛ so, wɔ mmerɛ bɔ né Yisraelfoɛ nate atunu bɛ́kɔ ngonimlilɛ so ɔ. 9Misraimfoɛ pole bɛ so: Faro mbɔngɔ mɔ ne teaseɛnam amukoraa, ye pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ ne ye asraafoɛ amukoraa, na bɛɛtole bɛ kyɛ basi asikyeleɛ wɔ ɛpo ne noa wɔ Pi Hahirote, wɔ Baal Sefon nyunu.
10Na mmerɛ bɔ Faro pingyele bɛ ne, Yisraelfoɛ mane bɛ nye so, na benwuni kyɛ Misraimfoɛ bɛ́po bɛ so; yiti ɛserɛ piri hane Yisraelfoɛ nemɔ, na besu bɛfrɛle AWURADE. 11Na besele Mose kyɛ, “Asieleɛ mɔ nne Misraim hɔ ɔ, bɔ yiti yeɛ afa yɛ awa kyɛ yɛɛwuwu yɛgua ɛserɛ ye aso ye? Ɛɛyele yɛ fili Misraim ne, bɔ amaa wato yɛ hɔ ɛne? 12 Anaa yanga yangyire wɔ wɔ Misraim kyɛ, “Yakyi yɛ konn ma yɛso Misraimfoɛ’? Ofikyɛ, sɛ yɛso Misraimfoɛ mmom a, ahaa ɔte paa tra kyɛ yɛkowuwu ɛserɛ so ɔ!”
13Na Mose sele mmenia ne kyɛ, “Nnɛma ɛmɔsuro, ɛ́mɔgyina pindinn, ná ɛ́mɔnea ngoalelɛ bɔ AWURADE kole ɛmɔ ɛnɛ ɔ; ofikyɛ Misraimfoɛ bɔ ɛmɔnwu bɛ ɛnɛ ye, ɛmɔngonwu bɛ ko le. 14AWURADE kɔho kɔma ɛmɔ, yiti ɛmɔ de, ɛ́mɔyɛ konn.”
15Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Nzu ati yeɛ esu frɛ me ye? Ka kyire Yisraelfoɛ kyɛ bɛhɔ bɛ nyunu. 16Ma wɔ pɔmaa ne aso, ná tengyɛ wɔ sa ɛpo ne aso ma nu hyɛ nyɔ, amaa ɔnate so Yisraelfoɛ afa aseɛ wosee so bapɛ ɛpo ne. 17Me de, ngɔma Misraimfoɛ kobubu mmakaa kotua bɛ so, amaa ɔnate so bapo Yisraelfoɛ so. Na ɔnate Faro ne ye asraafoɛ amukoraa so, ye teaseɛnam mɔ ne ye pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ so, ngɔhyɛ me nwo animnyam. 18Na sɛ ɔnate Faro ne ye teaseɛnam mɔ, ɔne ye pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ so mehyɛ me nwo animnyam a, Misraimfoɛ konwu ye kyɛ me ole AWURADE.”
19Afei Nyameɛ abɔfo bɔ né oli Yisrael ɛlɔen ne nyunu ne, ɔse oolili bɛ si. Na munungum ningɔnn ne fili bɛ nyunu oolili bɛ si, 20na oogyinane Misraim ɛlɔen ne Yisrael ɛlɔen b’afia. Na kɔngɔen ne amukoraa, munungum ne yɛle awosii mane bue ko, yeɛ ɔtale mane bue ko; yiti bue ko ne angora ambingye obiɛngo kɔngɔen ne.
21Afei Mose tengyɛle ye sa ɛpo ne aso. Na AWURADE mane eyia afiteleɛ mvrama piri bie tuli, na oopiane ɛpo ne sale nziɛ kɔngɔen ne. Ɔmane ɛpo ne kakyili aseɛ wosee, na nzue ne anu hyɛle. 22Na Yisraelfoɛ fale aseɛ wosee so pɛle ɛpo ne; na nzue ne yɛle ɛwaen mane bɛ wɔ bɛ famaa so ne bɛ bɛen so. 23Misraimfoɛ pole bɛ so. Faro mbɔngɔ mɔ, ye teaseɛnam ne ye pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ amukoraa belili bɛ si bɛhɔle ɛpo ne afia. 24Na alebahyene ne, AWURADE tole ye nye fale see ningɔnn ne munungum ne anu neane Misraim asraafoɛ ne, na ɔmane Misraim asraafoɛ nemɔ nye so tanene bɛ. 25Ɔmane bɛ teaseɛnam nemɔ gya sɛkyesɛkyele bɔ né bɛngora ndɛ kɔ ɔ. Yiti Misraimfoɛ sele kyɛ, “Ɛ́mɔma yɛ́nwati yɛ́fi Yisraelfoɛ mɔ nwo wa, ofikyɛ AWURADE gyi bɛ si ɔko tia Misraim.”
26Na AWURADE sele Mose kyɛ, “Tengyɛ wɔ sa wɔ ɛpo ne aso ma nzue ne sá ha bɔ nu, ná obu fa Misraimfoɛ ne bɛ teaseɛnam mɔ ne bɛ pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ so.” 27Yiti Mose tengyɛle ye sa wɔ ɛpo ne aso, na aleɛ baahye ne, ɛpo nzue ne sá wale ye boso. Na Misraimfoɛ bɛ́nwati bɛ́kɔ nen, AWURADE hane bɛ guale ɛpo ne anu wɔ asufia. 28Nzue ne ha tuale, na ɔfale teaseɛnam nemɔ, pɔngɔhanɛfoɛ nemɔ, ɔne Faro ɛlɔen amukoraa bɔ bɛpole Yisraelfoɛ so wɔ ɛpo ne anu ne. Bɛ nu ko po anga. 29Nakoso Yisraelfoɛ de, bɛfale aseɛ wosee so bɛpɛle ɛpo ne wɔ ye afia; na nzue ne yɛle ɛwaen mane bɛ wɔ bɛ famaa so ne bɛ bɛen so.
30Yiti AWURADE lele Yisraelfoɛ fili Misraimfoɛ sa nu sɔ kyẽa ne; na Yisraelfoɛ nwuni Misraimfoɛ kyɛ bawuwu bagua mboanoa berɛ. 31Yisraelfoɛ nwuni tumi piri bɔ AWURADE fa ho tiale Misraimfoɛ ne. Yiti Yisraelfoɛ surole AWURADE, na belele AWURADE ne ye somvoɛ Mose belili.
